# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-104">Définitions d’entités des types d’informations sensibles</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-105">La protection contre la perte de données (DLP) dans le Centre de conformité inclut de nombreux types d’informations sensibles prêts à être utilisés dans vos stratégies DLP.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="57723-106">Cet article répertorie tous ces types d’informations sensibles et indique ce qu’une stratégie DLP recherche lorsqu’elle détecte chaque type.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="57723-107">Pour en savoir plus sur les types d’informations sensibles, voir [Types d’informations sensibles](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-107">To learn more about sensitive information types, see [Sensitive information types](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-108">Numéro de routage ABA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-109">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-110">neuf chiffres qui peuvent être dans un modèle formaté ou sans mise en forme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-111">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-112">deux chiffres dans les plages 00-12, 21-32, 61-72 ou 80</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-113">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-114">un trait d’union facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-115">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-116">un trait d’union facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-117">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-118">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-119">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-120">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-121">Une stratégie a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-122">La fonction Func_aba_routing trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-123">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ABA_Routing est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-124">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-125">La fonction Func_aba_routing trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-143">Numéro d’identité nationale (DNI) argentine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-144">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-145">Huit chiffres avec ou sans points</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-146">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-147">Huit chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-148">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-149">une période facultative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-150">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-151">une période facultative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-152">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-153">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-154">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-155">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-156">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-157">L’expression régulière Regex_argentina_national_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-158">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_argentina_national_id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-170">Clé d’identification fiscale unique (PROGRAMME DNS) Argentine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-171">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-172">Chiffres à dix chiffres avec tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-172">Eleven digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-173">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-174">Dix chiffres avec un tiret :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-174">Eleven digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-175">deux chiffres dans les 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 ou 34</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-176">un trait d’union (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-177">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-178">un trait d’union (-)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-179">un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-180">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-181">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-182">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-183">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-184">La fonction `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-185">Un mot clé est `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-186">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-187">La fonction `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-226">Numéro de compte bancaire australie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-227">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-228">six à dix chiffres avec ou sans numéro de succursale bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-228">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-229">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-230">Le numéro de compte est de 6 à 10 chiffres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-231">Numéro de succursale bancaire en Australie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-232">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-233">un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-233">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-234">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-235">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-236">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-237">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-238">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-239">L’expression régulière Regex_australia_bank_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-240">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_australia_bank_account_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-241">L’expression régulière Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-242">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-243">L’expression régulière Regex_australia_bank_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-244">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_australia_bank_account_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

```xml
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-329">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-330">neuf lettres et chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-330">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-331">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-332">neuf lettres et chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-333">deux chiffres ou lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule) ;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-334">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-335">cinq chiffres ou lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-336">OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-337">une à deux lettres facultatives (ne sensibles pas à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-338">quatre à neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-339">OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-340">neuf chiffres ou lettres (ne sensibles pas à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-341">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-342">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-343">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-344">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-345">L’expression régulière Regex_australia_drivers_license_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-346">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-347">Aucun mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions n’est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-447">Numéro de compte médical australie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-448">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-449">10 à 11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-450">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-451">10 à 11 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-452">Le premier chiffre est compris entre 2 et 6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-453">Neuf chiffres est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-453">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-454">Le dixième chiffre est le chiffre d’émission</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-455">Le onzième chiffre (facultatif) est le numéro individuel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-456">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-457">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-458">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-459">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-460">La fonction Func_australian_medical_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-461">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-462">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-474">Numéro de passeport australien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-476">huit ou neuf caractères alphanumériques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span> 

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-477">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-478">une lettre (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) suivie de 7 chiffres ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by 7 digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-479">2 lettres (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) suivies de 7 chiffres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-479">2 letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by 7 digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-480">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-481">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-482">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-483">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-484">L’expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-485">Un mot clé est `Keyword_australia_passport_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-486">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-487">L’expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>  
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-507">Numéro de fichier fiscal australie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-508">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-509">huit à neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-510">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-511">De huit à neuf chiffres sont généralement présentés avec des espaces comme suit :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-512">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-512">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-513">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-513">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-514">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-514">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-515">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-515">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-516">deux à trois chiffres où le dernier chiffre est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-517">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-518">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-519">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-520">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-521">La fonction Func_australian_tax_file_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-522">Aucun mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number ou Keyword_number_exclusions n’est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-523">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-535">Numéro de permis de conduire autrichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-536">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-537">huit chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-538">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-539">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-539">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-540">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-541">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-541">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-542">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-543">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-544">L’expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-545">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-672">Carte d’identité Autriche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-673">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-674">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-675">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-676">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-677">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-678">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-679">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-680">Combinaison de 24 caractères de lettres, chiffres et caractères spéciaux</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-681">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-682">24 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-682">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="57723-683">22 lettres (ne sensibles pas à la majuscule), chiffres, barres obliques inverses, barres obliques ou signes plus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-684">deux lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule), des chiffres, des barres obliques inverses, des barres obliques, des signes plus ou des signes égaux</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-685">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-686">Non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-686">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-687">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-688">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-689">L’expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-690">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-691">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-691">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-693">numéro d’identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-693">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-694">id national</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-694">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-695">personalausliks republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-696">Numéro de passeport autrichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-697">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-698">Une lettre suivie d’un espace facultatif et de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-699">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-700">Combinaison d’une lettre, de sept chiffres et d’un espace :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-701">une lettre (ne doit pas être sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-702">un espace (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-703">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-703">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-704">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-705">non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-705">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-706">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-707">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-708">L’expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-709">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-710">L’expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` régulière trouve la date au format DD.MM.YYYY ou dans laquelle un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-711">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-712">L’expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-713">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-737">Numéro de sécurité sociale autrichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-738">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-739">10 chiffres au format spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-740">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-741">10 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-741">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-742">trois chiffres qui correspondent à un numéro de série</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-743">un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-744">six chiffres qui correspondent à la date de naissance (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-745">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-746">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-747">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-748">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-749">La fonction  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-750">un mot clé  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-751">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-752">La fonction  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-778">Numéro d’identification fiscale autrichen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-779">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-780">neuf chiffres avec trait d’union facultatif et barre oblique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-781">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-782">neuf chiffres avec trait d’union facultatif et barre oblique :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-783">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-784">un trait d’union (facultatif) ;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-785">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-786">barre oblique (facultative)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-787">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-787">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-788">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-789">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-789">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-790">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-791">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-792">La fonction  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-793">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-794">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-795">La fonction  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-818">Taxe sur la valeur ajoutée en Autriche</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-819">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-820">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-821">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-822">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-823">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-824">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-825">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-826">Modèle alphanumérique de 11 caractères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-827">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-828">Modèle alphanumérique de 11 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-841">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-842">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-843">La fonction Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-844">Un mot clé de Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-845">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-846">La fonction Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-864">Clé d’th azure DocumentDB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-865">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-866">Chaîne « DocumentDb » suivie des caractères et des chaînes indiqués dans le modèle ci-dessous.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-867">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-868">Chaîne « DocumentDb »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-869">Toute combinaison de 3 à 200 lettres minuscules ou majuscules, chiffres, symboles, caractères spéciaux ou espaces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-870">Supérieur au symbole (>), signe égal (=), guillemets (« ) ou apostrophe (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-871">Toute combinaison de 86 lettres minuscules ou majuscules, chiffres, barre oblique (/) ou signe plus (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-872">Deux signes égaux (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-873">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-874">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-875">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-876">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-877">L’expression régulière CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-878">L’expression régulière CEP_CommonExampleKeywords trouve pas de contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-893">Chaîne de connexion de base de données IAAS Azure et chaîne de connexion SQL azure</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-893">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-894">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-894">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-895">Chaîne « Serveur », « serveur » ou « source de données » suivie des caractères et des chaînes indiqués dans le modèle ci-dessous, y compris la chaîne « cloudapp.azure ».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-895">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="57723-896">com » ou « cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-896">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="57723-897">net » ou « database.windows .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-897">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="57723-898">et la chaîne « Password », « password » ou « pwd ».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-898">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-899">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-899">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-900">chaîne « Serveur », « serveur » ou « source de données »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-900">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-901">de zéro à deux caractères d’espace blanc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-902">signe égal (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-903">de zéro à deux caractères d’espace blanc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-904">toute combinaison de 1 à 200 lettres minuscules ou majuscules, chiffres, symboles, caractères spéciaux ou espaces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-904">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-905">La chaîne « cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-905">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="57723-906">com », « cloudapp.azure.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="57723-907">« database.windows ».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-907">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="57723-908">net »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-908">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-909">toute combinaison de 1 à 300 lettres minuscules ou majuscules, chiffres, symboles, caractères spéciaux ou espaces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-909">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-910">la chaîne « Password », « password » ou « pwd »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-910">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-911">de zéro à deux caractères d’espace blanc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-911">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-912">signe égal (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-912">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-913">de zéro à deux caractères d’espace blanc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-914">un ou plusieurs caractères qui ne sont pas des points-virgules (;), guillemets (« ), ou apostrophe (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-914">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-915">point-virgule (;), guillemets (« ), ou apostrophe (')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-915">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-916">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-917">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-918">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-919">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-919">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-920">L’expression régulière CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-920">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-921">L’expression régulière CEP_CommonExampleKeywords trouve pas de contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-921">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-936">Azure IoT de connexion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-936">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-937">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-938">Chaîne « HostName » suivie des caractères et des chaînes décrits dans le modèle ci-dessous, y compris les chaînes « azure-devices ».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-938">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="57723-939">net » et « SharedAccessKey ».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-939">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-940">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-940">Pattern</span></span>

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1052">Chaîne de connexion azure service bus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1052">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1053">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1054">Chaîne « EndPoint » suivie des caractères et des chaînes indiqués dans le modèle ci-dessous, y compris les chaînes « servicebus.windows ».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1054">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="57723-1055">net » et « SharedAccesKey ».</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1055">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1056">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1056">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1057">la chaîne « EndPoint »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1057">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1058">de zéro à deux caractères d’espace blanc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1058">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1059">signe égal (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1059">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1060">de zéro à deux caractères d’espace blanc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1060">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1061">toute combinaison de 1 à 200 lettres minuscules ou majuscules, chiffres, symboles, caractères spéciaux ou espaces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1061">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1062">la chaîne « servicebus.windows.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1062">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="57723-1063">net »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1063">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1064">toute combinaison de 1 à 200 lettres minuscules ou majuscules, chiffres, symboles, caractères spéciaux ou espaces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1064">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1065">la chaîne « SharedAccessKey »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1065">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1066">de zéro à deux caractères d’espace blanc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1066">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1067">signe égal (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1067">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1068">de zéro à deux caractères d’espace blanc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1068">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1069">toute combinaison de 43 caractères qui sont des lettres minuscules ou majuscules, des chiffres, une barre oblique (/) ou un signe plus (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1069">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1070">signe égal (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1070">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1071">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1071">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1072">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1072">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1073">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1073">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1074">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1074">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1075">L’expression régulière CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1075">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1076">L’expression régulière CEP_CommonExampleKeywords trouve pas de contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1076">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1095">la chaîne « DefaultEndpointsProtocol »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1095">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1096">de zéro à deux caractères d’espace blanc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1096">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1097">signe égal (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1097">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1098">de zéro à deux caractères d’espace blanc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1098">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1101">de zéro à deux caractères d’espace blanc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1101">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1102">signe égal (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1102">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1103">de zéro à deux caractères d’espace blanc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1103">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1104">toute combinaison de 86 caractères qui sont des lettres minuscules ou majuscules, des chiffres, une barre oblique (/) ou un signe plus (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1104">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1105">deux signes égaux (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1105">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1106">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1107">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1107">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1108">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1109">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1110">L’expression régulière CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1110">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1111">L’expression régulière CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter trouve pas de contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1111">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1112">L’expression régulière CEP_CommonExampleKeywords trouve pas de contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1112">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">

            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
