## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1130">stockage Azure de compte d’utilisateur (générique)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1130">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1131">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1131">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1132">Toute combinaison de 86 lettres minuscules ou majuscules, chiffres, barre oblique (/) ou signe plus (+), précédé ou suivi des caractères indiqués dans le modèle ci-dessous.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1132">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1133">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1133">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1134">zéro à l’un des symboles supérieurs (>), apostrophe ('), signe égal (=), guillemets (« ), ou di diétique (#)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1134">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1135">toute combinaison de 86 caractères qui sont des lettres minuscules ou majuscules, des chiffres, la barre oblique (/) ou le signe plus (+)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1135">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1136">deux signes égaux (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1136">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1137">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1138">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1139">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1140">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1140">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1141">L’expression régulière CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1141">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1142">Numéro de permis de conduire belgique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1142">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1143">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1144">10 chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1144">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1145">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1146">10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1146">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1147">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1148">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1148">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1149">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1150">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1150">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1151">L’expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1151">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1152">Mot clé à partir `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1152">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1285">Numéro national belgique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1285">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1286">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1287">11 chiffres plus des délimiteur facultatifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1287">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1288">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1289">11 chiffres plus des délimiteurs :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1289">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1290">six chiffres et deux points facultatifs au format AA. MM.DD pour la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1290">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1291">Délimiteur facultatif de point, tiret, espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1291">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1292">trois chiffres séquentiels (impair pour les hommes, même pour les femme)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1292">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1293">Délimiteur facultatif de point, tiret, espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1293">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1294">deux chiffres de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1294">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1295">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1296">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1296">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1297">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1298">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1299">La fonction Func_belgium_national_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1299">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1300">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_belgium_national_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1300">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1301">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1301">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1302">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1302">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1303">La fonction Func_belgium_national_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1303">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1304">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1304">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1363">Numéro de passeport belgique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1363">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1364">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1365">deux lettres suivies de six chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1365">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1366">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1367">deux lettres suivies de six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1367">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1368">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1369">non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1369">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1370">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1370">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="57723-1371">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1372">L’expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1372">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1373">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1373">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1374">L’expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` régulière trouve la date au format JA J.-C. J.-C. ou un mot clé de ou est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1374">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1375">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1375">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1376">L’expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1376">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1377">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1377">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1410">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1410">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1411">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1412">Modèle alphanumérique de 12 caractères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1412">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1413">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1414">Modèle alphanumérique de 12 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1414">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1415">une lettre B ou b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1415">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1416">une lettre E ou e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1416">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1417">un chiffre 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1417">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1418">un chiffre de 1 à 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1418">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1419">point ou tiret ou espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1419">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1420">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1420">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1421">point ou tiret ou espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1421">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1422">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1422">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1423">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1424">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1424">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1425">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1426">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1427">La fonction Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1427">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1428">Un mot clé de Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1428">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1429">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1430">La fonction Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1430">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1442">Numéro CPF Brésil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1442">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1443">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1444">11 chiffres qui incluent un chiffre de contrôle et peuvent ou non être mis en forme </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1444">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1445">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1446">Formaté :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1446">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1447">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1447">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1448">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1448">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1449">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1449">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1450">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1450">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1451">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1451">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1452">un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1452">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1453">deux chiffres qui sont des chiffres de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1453">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1454">Non formaté :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1454">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1455">11 chiffres où les deux derniers sont des chiffres de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1455">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1456">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1457">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1458">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1459">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1460">La fonction Func_brazil_cpf trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1460">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1461">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_brazil_cpf est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1461">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1462">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1462">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1463">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1464">La fonction Func_brazil_cpf trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1464">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1465">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1477">Numéro d’entité juridique brésil (CNPJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1477">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1478">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1479">14 chiffres qui incluent un numéro d’enregistrement, un numéro de succursale et des chiffres de contrôle, avec des délimiteurs en plus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1479">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1480">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1481">14 chiffres plus des délimiteurs :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1481">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1482">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1482">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1483">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1483">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1484">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1484">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1485">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1485">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1486">trois chiffres (ces huit premiers chiffres sont le numéro d’inscription)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1486">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1487">barre oblique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1487">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1488">Numéro de succursale à quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1488">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1489">un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1489">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1490">deux chiffres qui sont des chiffres de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1490">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1491">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1492">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1492">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1493">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1494">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1494">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1495">La fonction Func_brazil_cnpj trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1495">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1496">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_brazil_cnpj est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1496">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1497">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1497">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1498">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1498">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1499">La fonction Func_brazil_cnpj trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1499">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1500">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1522">Carte d’identification nationale (RG) brésil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1522">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1523">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1524">Registro Geral (ancien format) : neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1524">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nouveau format) : 11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1526">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1527">Registro Geral (ancien format) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1527">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1528">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1528">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1529">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1529">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1530">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1530">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1531">un point</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1531">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1532">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1532">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1533">un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1533">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1534">un chiffre qui est un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1534">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (nouveau format) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1536">10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1536">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1537">un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1537">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1538">un chiffre qui est un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1538">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1539">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1540">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1540">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1541">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1542">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1542">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1543">La fonction Func_brazil_rg trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1543">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1544">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_brazil_rg est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1544">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1545">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1545">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1548">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1548">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1549">Carte d’identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1549">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1550">id national</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1550">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1551">Número de registro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1551">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1552">Registro de Identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1552">registro de Iidentidade</span></span>

## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1556">Numéro de permis de conduire bulgare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1556">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1557">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1558">neuf chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1558">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1559">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1560">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1560">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1561">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1562">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1563">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1564">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1565">L’expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1565">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1566">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1693">Numéro civile uniforme bulgare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1693">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-1694">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1694">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1695">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1695">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1696">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1696">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1697">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1697">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1698">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1698">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1699">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1699">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1700">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1701">10 chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1701">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1702">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1703">10 chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1703">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1704">six chiffres qui correspondent à la date de naissance (AAMMMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1704">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1705">deux chiffres qui correspondent à l’ordre de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1705">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1706">un chiffre qui correspond au sexe : un chiffre pair pour l’homme et un chiffre impair pour la femme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1706">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1707">un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1707">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1708">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1709">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1709">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1710">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1711">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1712">La fonction  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1712">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1713">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1713">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1714">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1714">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1715">La fonction  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1715">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1760">Numéro de passeport bulgare</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1760">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1761">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1762">neuf chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1762">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1763">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1764">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1764">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1765">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1766">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1766">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1767">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1768">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1768">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1769">L’expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1769">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1770">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1771">L’expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` régulière trouve la date au format DD.MM.YYYY ou dans laquelle un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1771">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1772">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1772">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1773">L’expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1773">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1774">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1774">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1794">Numéro de compte bancaire canada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1794">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1795">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1796">7 ou 12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1796">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1797">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1798">Un numéro de compte bancaire canadien est de 7 ou 12 chiffres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1798">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1799">Un numéro de transit de compte bancaire du Canada est indiqué au format suivant :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1799">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1800">cinq chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1800">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1801">un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1801">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1802">trois chiffres OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1802">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1803">zéro « 0 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1803">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1804">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1804">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1805">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1806">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1807">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1808">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1808">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1809">L’expression régulière Regex_canada_bank_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1809">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1810">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_canada_bank_account_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1810">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1811">L’expression régulière Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1811">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1812">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1813">L’expression régulière Regex_canada_bank_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1813">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1814">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_canada_bank_account_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1814">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1838">Numéro de permis de conduire canada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1838">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1839">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1839">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1840">Varie selon la province</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1840">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1841">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1841">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1842">Plusieurs modèles pour les différentes provinces : Alberta, Colombie-Britannique, Manitoba, Nouveau-Brunswick, Terre-Neuve-et-Labrador, Nouvelle-Écosse, Ontario, Île-du-Prince-Édouard, Québec et Saskatchewan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1842">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1843">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1844">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1844">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1845">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1846">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1847">La fonction Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1847">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1848">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1848">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1849">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_canada_drivers_license est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1849">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1985">Numéro de service de santé canada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1985">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1986">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1986">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="57723-1987">10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1987">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1988">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1988">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1989">10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1989">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1990">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1991">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1991">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-1992">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-1993">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1994">L’expression régulière Regex_canada_health_service_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1994">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-1995">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_canada_health_service_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-1995">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2007">Numéro de passeport canada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2007">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2008">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2008">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2009">deux lettres majuscules suivies de six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2009">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2010">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2010">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2011">deux lettres majuscules suivies de six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2011">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2012">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2012">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2013">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2013">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2014">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2014">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2015">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2015">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2016">L’expression régulière Regex_canada_passport_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2016">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2047">Numéro d’identification de santé personnel (PHIN) canada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2047">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2048">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2048">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2049">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2049">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2050">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2050">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2051">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2051">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2052">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2052">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2053">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2053">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2054">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2054">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2055">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2055">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2056">L’expression régulière Regex_canada_phin trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2056">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2057">Au moins deux mots clés de Keyword_canada_phin ou Keyword_canada_provinces sont trouvés.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2057">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2090">Numéro d’assurance sociale canada</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2090">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2091">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2092">neuf chiffres avec des traits d’union ou des espaces facultatifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2092">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2093">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2094">Mise en forme :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2094">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2095">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2095">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2096">trait d’union ou espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2096">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2097">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2097">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2098">trait d’union ou espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2098">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2099">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2099">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2100">Non formaté : neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2100">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2101">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2102">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2102">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2103">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2104">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2104">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2105">La fonction Func_canadian_sin trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2105">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2106">Au moins deux des éléments suivants, quelle que soit la combinaison :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2106">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-2107">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_sin est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2107">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-2108">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_sin_collaborative est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2108">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-2109">La fonction Func_eu_date trouve une date au format correct.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2109">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2110">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2110">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2111">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2111">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2112">La fonction Func_unformatted_canadian_sin trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2112">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2113">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_sin est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2113">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2114">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2114">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2139">Numéro de carte d’identité Chili</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2139">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2140">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2141">sept à huit chiffres plus des délimiteur d’un chiffre ou d’une lettre à cocher</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2141">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2142">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2143">sept à huit chiffres plus des délimiteurs :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2143">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2144">un à deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2144">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2145">période facultative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2145">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2146">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2146">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2147">période facultative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2147">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2148">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2148">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2149">un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2149">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2150">un chiffre ou une lettre (ne sensible à la cas) qui est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2150">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2151">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2152">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2152">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2153">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2154">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2155">La fonction Func_chile_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2155">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2156">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_chile_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2156">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2157">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2157">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2158">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2158">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2159">La fonction Func_chile_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2159">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2160">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2160">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2197">Numéro de carte d’identité résidente en Chine (RPC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2197">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2198">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2199">18 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2199">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2200">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2201">18 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2201">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2202">six chiffres qui sont un code d’adresse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2202">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2203">huit chiffres sous la forme YYYYMMDD, qui sont la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2203">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2204">trois chiffres qui sont un code de commande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2204">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2205">un chiffre qui est un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2205">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2206">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2207">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2207">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2208">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2209">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2209">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2210">La fonction Func_china_resident_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2210">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2211">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_china_resident_id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2211">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2212">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2212">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2213">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2214">La fonction Func_china_resident_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2214">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2215">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2215">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
