## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2228">Numéro de carte de crédit</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2228">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2229">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2230">14 à 16 chiffres qui peuvent être mis en forme ou non mis en forme (ddddddd) et qui doivent réussir le test Luhn.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2230">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2231">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2232">Modèle complexe et robuste qui détecte les cartes de toutes les principales marques dans le monde, notamment Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, cartes-anniversaire et cartes-cartes- card.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2232">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2233">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2234">Oui, la somme de contrôle de Luhn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2234">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2235">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2236">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2237">La fonction Func_credit_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2237">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2238">L’une des affirmations suivantes est vraie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-2239">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_cc_verification est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2239">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-2240">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_cc_name est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2240">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-2241">La fonction Func_expiration_date trouve une date au format correct.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2241">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2242">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2243">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2243">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2244">La fonction Func_credit_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2244">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2245">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2245">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">

          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />

  </Pattern>

  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2505">Numéro de permis de conduire croate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2505">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2507">huit chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2507">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2508">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2509">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2509">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2510">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2511">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2511">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2512">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2513">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2513">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2514">L’expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2514">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2515">Mot clé à partir `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2515">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2639">Numéro de carte d’identité Croate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2639">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-2640">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles Numéro d’identification national de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2640">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="57723-2641">Il est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2641">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2642">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2642">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2643">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2643">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2644">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2644">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2645">neuf chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2645">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2646">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2647">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2648">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2649">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2650">La fonction Func_croatia_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2650">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2651">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_croatia_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2651">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2682">Numéro de passeport croate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2682">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2684">neuf chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2684">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2685">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2686">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2686">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2687">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2688">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2688">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2689">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2690">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2690">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2691">L’expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2691">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2692">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2692">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2693">L’expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` régulière trouve la date au format DD.MM.YYYY ou dans laquelle un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2693">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2694">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2694">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2695">L’expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2695">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2696">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2696">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2714">Numéro d’identification personnelle (OIB) croate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2714">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2715">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2715">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2716">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2716">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2717">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2717">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2718">11 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2718">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2719">10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2719">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2720">le chiffre final est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2720">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2721">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2721">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2722">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2722">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2723">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2723">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2724">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2724">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2725">La fonction Func_croatia_oib_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2725">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2726">Un mot clé de Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2726">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2727">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2727">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2728">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2728">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2729">La fonction Func_croatia_oib_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2729">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2730">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2730">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2761">Numéro de permis de conduire à Chypre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2761">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2762">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2763">12 chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2763">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2764">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2765">12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2765">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2766">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2767">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2767">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2768">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2769">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2769">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2770">L’expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2770">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2771">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2771">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2896">Carte d’identité Chypre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2896">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-2897">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2897">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2898">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2898">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2899">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2899">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2900">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2900">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2901">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2901">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2902">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2902">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2903">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2904">10 chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2904">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2905">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2906">10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2906">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2907">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2908">non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2908">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2909">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2910">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2910">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2911">L’expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2911">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2912">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2912">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2921">Numéro de passeport à Chypre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2921">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2922">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2923">une lettre suivie de 6 à 8 chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2923">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2924">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2925">une lettre suivie de six à huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2925">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2926">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2926">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2927">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2927">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2928">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2928">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2929">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2929">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2930">L’expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2930">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2931">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2931">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2932">L’expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` régulière trouve la date au format JD/MM/AAA OU un mot clé à partir de laquelle est `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2932">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2933">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2933">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2934">L’expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2934">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2935">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2935">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2964">Numéro d’identification fiscale à Chypre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2964">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-2965">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2965">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2966">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2966">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2967">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2967">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2968">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2968">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2969">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2969">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2970">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2970">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2971">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2972">huit chiffres et une lettre dans le modèle spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2972">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2973">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2974">huit chiffres et une lettre :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2974">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2975">un « 0 » ou « 9 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2975">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2976">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2976">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2977">une lettre (ne doit pas être sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2977">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2978">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2979">non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2979">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-2980">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-2981">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2981">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2982">La fonction  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2982">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2983">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2983">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-2984">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2984">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-2985">La fonction  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-2985">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3013">Numéro de permis de conduire tchèque</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3013">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3014">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3014">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3015">deux lettres suivies de six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3015">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3016">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3016">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3017">huit lettres et chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3017">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3018">lettre 'E' (ne pas sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3018">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3019">une lettre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3019">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3020">un espace (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3020">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3021">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3021">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3022">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3023">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3023">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3024">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3025">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3026">L’expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3026">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3027">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3027">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3153">Numéro de passeport tchèque</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3153">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3154">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3155">huit chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3155">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3156">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3157">huit chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3157">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3158">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3159">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3159">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3160">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3161">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3161">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3162">L’expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3162">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3163">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3163">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3164">L’expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` régulière trouve la date au format DD.MM.YYYY ou dans laquelle un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3164">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3165">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3165">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3166">L’expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3166">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3167">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3167">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3189">Numéro d’identité personnel tchèque</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3189">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3190">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3191">neuf chiffres avec barre oblique facultative (ancien format) 10 chiffres avec barre oblique facultative (nouveau format)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3191">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3192">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3193">neuf chiffres (ancien format) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3193">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3194">six chiffres qui représentent la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3194">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3195">barre oblique facultative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3195">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3196">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3196">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3197">10 chiffres (nouveau format) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3197">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3198">six chiffres qui représentent la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3198">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3199">barre oblique facultative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3199">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3200">quatre chiffres où le dernier chiffre est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3200">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3201">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3202">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3203">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3204">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3205">La fonction Func_czech_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3205">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3206">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_czech_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3206">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3207">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3207">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3208">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3208">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3209">La fonction Func_czech_id_card_new_format trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3209">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3210">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3257">Numéro de permis de conduire danois</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3257">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3258">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3259">huit chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3259">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3260">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3261">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3261">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3262">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3263">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3263">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3264">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3265">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3265">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3266">L’expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3266">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3267">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3267">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3392">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3393">neuf chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3393">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3394">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3395">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3395">nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3397">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3397">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3398">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3399">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3400">L’expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3400">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3401">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3401">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3402">L’expression régulière trouve la date au format MM AA ou un mot clé à `Regex_eu_passport_date2` partir de laquelle est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3402">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3403">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3403">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3404">L’expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3404">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3405">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3405">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3425">Numéro d’identification personnel danemark</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3425">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3426">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3427">10 chiffres contenant un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3427">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3428">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3428">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3429">10 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3429">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3430">six chiffres au format DDMMYY, qui sont la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3430">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3431">un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3431">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3432">quatre chiffres où le dernier chiffre est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3432">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3433">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3433">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3434">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3434">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3435">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3435">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3436">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3437">L’expression régulière Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3437">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3438">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_denmark_id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3438">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3439">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3439">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3440">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3440">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3441">L’expression régulière Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3441">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3442">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3442">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3514">Numéro de la Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3514">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3515">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3516">deux lettres suivies de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3516">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3517">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3518">Le modèle doit inclure tous les éléments suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3518">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3519">une lettre (ne sensible à la majuscule) de cet ensemble de lettres possibles : abcdefghjklmnprstux, qui est un code de registre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3519">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3520">une lettre (ne particulièrement sensible à la cas), qui est la première lettre du nom de famille ou du chiffre « 9 » du registre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3520">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3521">sept chiffres, dont le dernier est le chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3521">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3522">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3523">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3523">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3524">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3525">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3525">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3526">La fonction Func_dea_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3526">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3527">Un mot clé est `Keyword_dea_number` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3527">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3528">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3528">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3529">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3529">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3530">La fonction Func_dea_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3530">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3531">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3531">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3532">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3532">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3534">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3534">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3535">dea #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3535">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3536">administration de l’application de la loi sur les anti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3536">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3537">agence d’application de la loi anti-trafic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3537">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3538">Numéro de permis de conduire estonien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3538">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3539">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3540">deux lettres suivies de six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3540">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3541">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3542">deux lettres et six chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3542">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3543">les lettres « ET » (ne sont pas sensibles à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3543">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3544">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3544">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3545">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3546">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3546">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3547">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3548">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3548">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3549">L’expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3549">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3550">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3550">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3676">Code d’identification personnelle estonien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3676">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-3677">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3677">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3678">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3678">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3679">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3679">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3680">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3681">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3682">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3684">11 chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3684">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3685">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3686">11 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3687">un chiffre qui correspond à des sexes et des années de naissance (nombre impair d’hommes, même nombre de femme ; 1-2 : 19e s. ; 3-4 : 20e s. ; 5-6 : 21e s.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3687">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3688">six chiffres qui correspondent à la date de naissance (AAMMMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3688">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3689">trois chiffres qui correspondent à un numéro de série séparant des personnes qui sont né à la même date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3689">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3690">un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3690">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3691">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3692">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3693">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3694">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3695">La fonction  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3695">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3696">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3696">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-3697">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3698">La fonction  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3698">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3731">Numéro de passeport estonien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3731">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3732">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3733">une lettre suivie de sept chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3733">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3734">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3735">une lettre suivie de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3735">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3736">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3737">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3737">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3738">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3739">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3739">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3740">L’expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3740">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3741">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3741">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3742">L’expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` régulière trouve la date au format DD.MM.YYYY ou dans laquelle un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3742">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3743">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3743">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3744">L’expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3744">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3745">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3745">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3748">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3748">passport#</span></span>
