## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3763">Numéro de carte de crédit de l'UE</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3763">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3764">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3765">16 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3765">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3766">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3767">Modèle complexe et robuste</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3767">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3768">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3769">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3769">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-3770">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-3771">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3771">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3772">La fonction Func_eu_debit_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3772">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3773">Au moins une des affirmations suivantes est vraie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3773">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-3774">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_eu_debit_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3774">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-3775">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_card_terms_dict est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3775">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-3776">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_card_security_terms_dict est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3776">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-3777">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3777">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-3778">La fonction Func_expiration_date trouve une date au format correct.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3778">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-3779">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-3779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4226">Numéro de permis de conduire finlande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4226">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4227">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4228">10 chiffres contenant un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4228">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4229">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4230">10 chiffres contenant un trait d’union :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4230">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4231">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4231">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4232">un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4232">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4233">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4233">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4234">un chiffre ou une lettre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4234">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4235">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4236">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4236">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4237">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4238">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4238">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4239">L’expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4239">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4240">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4240">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4371">Numéro d’assurance santé européen (Finlande)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4371">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-4372">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4372">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4373">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4373">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4374">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4374">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4375">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4375">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4376">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4376">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4377">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4377">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4378">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4379">Numéro à 20 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4379">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4380">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4381">Nombre à 20 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4381">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4382">10 chiffres - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4382">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4383">espace ou trait d’union facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4383">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4384">10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4384">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4385">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4385">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4386">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4386">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4387">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4387">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4388">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4388">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4389">L’Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number recherche le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4389">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4390">Un mot clé de Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4390">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4408">ID national (Finlande)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4408">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4409">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4410">six chiffres plus un caractère indiquant un xème plus trois chiffres plus un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4410">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4411">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4412">Le modèle doit inclure tous les éléments suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4412">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4413">six chiffres au format DDMMYY, qui sont une date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4413">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4414">marqueur de century ('-', '+' ou 'a')</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4414">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4415">numéro d’identification personnel à trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4415">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4416">un chiffre ou une lettre (ne sensible à la cas) qui est un chiffre de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4416">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4417">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4418">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4418">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4419">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4420">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4420">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4421">la fonction Func_finnish_national_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4421">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4422">un mot clé de Keyword_finnish_national_id trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4422">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4423">la passe de la passe de la passe de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4423">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4424">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4424">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4425">la fonction Func_finnish_national_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4425">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4426">la passe de la passe de la passe de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4426">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4475">Numéro de passeport finlande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4475">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4476">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles Numéro de passeport de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4476">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4477">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4477">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-4478">combinaison de neuf lettres et chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4478">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4479">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4479">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-4480">combinaison de neuf lettres et chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4480">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4481">deux lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4481">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4482">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4482">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4483">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4483">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4484">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4484">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4485">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4485">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4486">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4486">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4487">L’expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4487">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4488">Mot clé à partir `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keyword_finland_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4488">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4489">L’expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` régulière trouve la date au format DD.MM.YYYY ou dans laquelle un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4489">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4490">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4490">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4491">L’expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4491">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4492">Mot clé à partir `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keyword_finland_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4492">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4516">Numéro de permis de conduire français</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4516">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4517">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles Numéro de permis de conduire de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4517">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4518">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4519">12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4519">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4520">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4521">12 chiffres avec validation pour écarter les modèles similaires, comme les numéros de téléphone français</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4521">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4522">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4523">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4523">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4524">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4525">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4526">la fonction Func_french_drivers_license trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4526">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4527">un mot clé de Keyword_french_drivers_license est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4527">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4528">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4528">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_french_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4529">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4529">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4530">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4530">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4531">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4531">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4532">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4532">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4533">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4533">driverlicenses</span></span>

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4654">Numéro d’assurance maladie français</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4654">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-4655">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4655">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4656">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4656">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4657">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4657">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4658">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4658">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4659">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4659">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4660">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4660">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4661">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4662">Numéro à 21 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4662">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4663">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4664">Nombre à 21 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4664">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4665">10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4665">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4666">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4666">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4667">10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4667">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4668">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4669">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4669">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4670">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4671">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4671">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4672">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4673">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4673">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4674">l’Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number regex trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4674">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4675">un mot clé de Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4675">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
```

## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4681">Carte d’identité nationale (CNI) france</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4681">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4683">12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4683">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4684">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4685">12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4685">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4686">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4686">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4687">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4687">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4688">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4688">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4689">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4689">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4690">L’expression régulière Regex_france_cni trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4690">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4691">Un mot clé de Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4691">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4705">Numéro de passeport français</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4705">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-4706">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est disponible dans le type d’informations sensibles Numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4706">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="57723-4707">Il est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4707">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4708">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4709">neuf chiffres et lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4709">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4710">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4710">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4711">neuf chiffres et lettres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4711">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4712">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4712">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4713">deux lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4713">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4714">cinq chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4714">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4715">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4716">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4716">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4717">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4718">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4718">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4719">La fonction `Func_fr_passport` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4719">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4720">Mot clé à partir `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4720">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4721">L’expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` régulière trouve la date au format MM AAA OU un mot clé à partir de laquelle est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4721">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4722">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4722">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4723">La fonction `Func_fr_passport` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4723">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4724">Mot clé à partir `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4724">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4755">Numéro de sécurité sociale français (INSEE)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4755">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4756">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4757">15 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4757">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4758">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4759">Doit correspondre à l’un des deux modèles suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4759">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4760">13 chiffres suivis d’un espace suivi de deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4760">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-4761">ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4761">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4762">15 chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4762">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4763">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4764">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4764">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4765">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4766">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4766">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4767">La fonction `Func_french_insee` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4767">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4768">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_fr_insee est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4768">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4769">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4769">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4770">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4770">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4771">La fonction Func_french_insee ou Func_fr_insee trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4771">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4772">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4772">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4773">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4773">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4774">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4774">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4780">le code de la sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4780">le code de la sécurité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4781">id national</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4781">national id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-p133">
n° d’identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-p133">no. d'identité</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4803">Numéro d’identification fiscale français</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4803">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4804">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4805">13 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4805">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4806">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4807">13 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4807">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4808">Un chiffre qui doit être 0, 1, 2 ou 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4808">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4809">Un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4809">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4810">Un espace (facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4810">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4811">Deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4811">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4812">Un espace (facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4812">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4813">Trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4813">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4814">Un espace (facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4814">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4815">Trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4815">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4816">Un espace (facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4816">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4817">Trois chiffres de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4817">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4818">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4818">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4819">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4819">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4820">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4820">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4821">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4821">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4822">La fonction  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4822">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4823">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4823">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-4824">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4824">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4825">La fonction  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4825">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4845">Numéro de taxe sur la valeur ajoutée pour la France</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4845">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-4846">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4846">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4847">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4847">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4848">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4848">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4849">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4849">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4850">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4850">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4851">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4851">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4852">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4853">Modèle alphanumérique de 13 caractères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4853">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4854">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4855">Modèle alphanumérique de 13 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4855">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4856">deux lettres - FR (ne sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4856">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4857">espace ou trait d’union facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4857">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4858">deux lettres ou chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4858">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4859">espace, point, tiret ou virgule facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4859">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4860">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4860">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4861">espace, point, tiret ou virgule facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4861">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4862">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4862">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4863">espace, point, tiret ou virgule facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4863">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4864">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4864">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4865">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4866">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4866">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4867">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4868">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4868">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4869">La fonction Func_france_value_added_tax_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4869">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4870">Un mot clé de Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4870">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4871">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4871">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4872">La fonction Func_france_value_added_tax_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4872">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4885">Numéro de permis de conduire allemand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4885">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4886">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles Numéro de permis de conduire de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4886">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="57723-4887">Il est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4887">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4888">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4889">combinaison de 11 chiffres et lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4889">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4890">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4891">11 chiffres et lettres (ne sensibles pas à la majuscule) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4891">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4892">un chiffre ou une lettre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4892">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4893">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4893">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4894">six chiffres ou lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4894">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4895">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4895">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4896">un chiffre ou une lettre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4896">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4897">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4898">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4898">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-4899">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-4900">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4900">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4901">La fonction Func_german_drivers_license trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4901">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4902">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_german_drivers_license_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4902">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-4903">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-4903">The checksum passes.</span></span>

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5052">Numéro de carte d’identité Allemagne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5052">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5053">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5054">depuis le 1er novembre 2010 : neuf lettres et chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5054">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5055">du 1er avril 1987 au 31 octobre 2010 : 10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5055">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5056">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5057">depuis le 1er novembre 2010 :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5057">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5058">une lettre (ne doit pas être sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5058">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5059">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5059">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5060">du 1er avril 1987 au 31 octobre 2010 :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5060">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5061">10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5061">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5062">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5063">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5063">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5064">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5065">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5065">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5066">L’expression régulière Regex_germany_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5066">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5067">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_germany_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5067">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5083">Numéro de passeport allemand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5083">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5084">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles Numéro de passeport de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5084">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5085">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5086">10 chiffres ou lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5086">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5087">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5088">Le modèle doit inclure tous les éléments suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5088">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5089">le premier caractère est un chiffre ou une lettre de ce jeu (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5089">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5090">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5090">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5091">cinq chiffres ou lettres de cet ensemble (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5091">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5092">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5092">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5093">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5093">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5094">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5094">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5095">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5095">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5096">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5096">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5097">La fonction Func_german_passport trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5097">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5098">Mot clé à partir `Keyword_german_passport` de ou `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5098">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5099">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5099">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5100">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5100">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5101">La fonction Func_german_passport_data trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5101">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5102">Mot clé à partir `Keyword_german_passport` de ou `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5102">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5103">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5103">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5126">Numéro d’identification fiscale allemand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5126">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5127">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5128">11 chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5128">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5129">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5130">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5130">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5131">Deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5131">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5132">Un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5132">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5133">Trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5133">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5134">Un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5134">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5135">Trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5135">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5136">Un espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5136">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5137">Deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5137">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5138">un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5138">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5139">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5140">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5140">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5141">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5142">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5142">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5143">La fonction  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5143">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5144">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5144">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-5145">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5145">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5146">La fonction  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5146">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5147">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5147">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5148">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5148">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5149">identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5149">identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5150">steuer id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5150">steuer id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5151">steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5151">steueridentifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5152">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5152">steuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5153">id fiscal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5153">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5172">Numéro de taxe sur la valeur ajoutée en Allemagne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5172">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-5173">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5173">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5174">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5174">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5175">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5175">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5176">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5176">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5177">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5177">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5178">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5178">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5179">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5180">Modèle alphanumérique de 11 caractères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5180">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5181">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5182">Modèle alphanumérique de 11 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5182">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5183">une lettre D ou d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5183">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5184">une lettre E ou e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5184">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5185">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5185">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5186">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5186">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5187">espace ou virgule facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5187">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5188">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5188">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5189">espace ou virgule facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5189">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5190">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5191">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5192">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5192">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5193">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5194">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5194">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5195">La fonction Func_germany_value_added_tax_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5195">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5196">Un mot clé de Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5196">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5197">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5197">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5198">La fonction Func_germany_value_added_tax_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5198">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
