## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5208">Numéro de permis de conduire grec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5208">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5209">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles Numéro de permis de conduire de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5209">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5210">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5211">neuf chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5211">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5212">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5213">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5213">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5214">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5215">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5215">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5216">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5217">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5217">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5218">L’expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5218">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5219">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5219">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5345">Carte d’identité nationale grèce</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5345">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5346">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5346">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5347">Combinaison de 7 ou 8 lettres et chiffres, plus un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5347">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5348">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5348">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5349">Sept lettres et chiffres (ancien format) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5349">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5350">Une lettre (de l’alphabet grec) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5350">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5351">Un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5351">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5352">Six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5352">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5353">Huit lettres et chiffres (nouveau format) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5353">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5354">Deux lettres dont le caractère majuscule figure à la fois dans l’alphabet grec et l’alphabet latin (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5354">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5355">Un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5355">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5356">Six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5356">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5357">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5358">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5358">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5359">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5360">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5360">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5361">L’expression régulière Regex_greece_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5361">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5362">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_greece_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5362">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5363">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5363">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5364">L’expression régulière Regex_greece_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5364">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5369">carte d’identité personnelle grec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5369">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5370">ID de police grec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5370">greek police id</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5375">Numéro de passeport grec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5375">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5376">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5377">Deux lettres suivies de sept chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5377">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5378">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5379">Deux lettres suivies de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5379">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5380">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5381">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5381">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5382">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5383">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5384">L’expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5384">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5385">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5385">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5386">L’expression régulière trouve la date au `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` format DD MMM AA (exemple - 28 août 19) ou un mot clé à partir `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` de laquelle est trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5386">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5387">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5388">L’expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5388">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5389">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5390">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5390">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5391">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5391">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5392">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5392">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5393">passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5393">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5394">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5394">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5395">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5395">passports</span></span>

## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5406">Numéro de sécurité sociale grec (AMKA)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5406">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-5407">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5407">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5408">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5408">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5409">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5409">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5410">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5410">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5411">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5411">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5412">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5412">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5413">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5414">Dix chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5414">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5415">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5415">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5416">6 chiffres comme date de naissance AAMMMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5416">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5417">4 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5417">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5418">un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5418">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5419">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5420">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5420">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5421">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5422">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5422">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5423">La fonction  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5423">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5424">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5424">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-5425">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5425">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5426">La fonction  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5426">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5437">Numéro d’identification fiscale grec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5437">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-5438">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5438">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5439">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5439">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5440">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5440">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5441">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5441">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5442">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5442">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5443">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5443">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5444">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5445">Neuf chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5445">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5446">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5447">Neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5447">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5448">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5448">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5449">Non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5449">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5450">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5450">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5451">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5451">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5452">L’expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5452">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5453">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5453">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5482">Numéro de carte d’identité (HKID) Hong Kong</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5482">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5483">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5484">Combinaison de 8 ou 9 lettres et chiffres plus éventuellement des parenthèses autour du dernier caractère</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5484">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5485">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5486">Combinaison de 8 ou 9 lettres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5486">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5487">1 à 2 lettres (ne sensibles pas à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5487">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5488">Six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5488">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5489">Le dernier caractère (un chiffre ou la lettre A), qui est le chiffre de contrôle et est éventuellement entre parenthèses.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5489">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5490">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5490">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5491">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5491">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5492">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5492">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5493">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5493">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5494">La fonction Func_hong_kong_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5494">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5495">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_hong_kong_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5495">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5496">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5496">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5497">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5497">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5498">La fonction Func_hong_kong_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5498">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5499">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5499">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5500">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5500">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hong_kong_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5501">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5501">Keyword_hong_kong_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5502">hkid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5502">hkid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5503">carte d’identité hong kong</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5503">hong kong identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5504">HKIDC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5504">HKIDC</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5505">carte d’identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5505">id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5506">Carte d’identité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5506">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5507">carte d’identité hk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5507">hk identity card</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5539">Numéro de permis de conduire hongrois</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5539">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5540">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5540">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5541">Deux lettres suivies de six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5541">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5542">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5542">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5543">Deux lettres et six chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5543">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5544">Deux lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5544">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5545">Six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5545">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5546">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5547">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5547">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5548">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5549">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5549">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5550">L’expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5550">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5551">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5551">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5676">Numéro d’identification personnel hongrie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5676">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-5677">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5677">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5678">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5678">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5679">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5679">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5680">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5681">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5682">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5684">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5684">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5685">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5686">11 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5687">Un chiffre qui correspond au sexe (un homme, deux femme, d’autres nombres sont également possibles pour les citoyens natifs avant 1900 ou citoyens avec une double nationalité)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5687">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5688">Six chiffres qui correspondent à la date de naissance (AAMMMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5688">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5689">Trois chiffres qui correspondent à un numéro de série</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5689">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5690">Un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5690">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5691">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5692">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5693">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5694">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5695">La fonction  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5695">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5696">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5696">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-5697">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5698">La fonction  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5698">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5709">Numéro de passeport hongrois</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5709">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5710">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5710">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5711">Deux lettres suivies de six ou sept chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5711">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5712">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5712">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5713">Deux lettres suivies de six ou sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5713">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5714">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5714">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5715">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5715">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5716">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5716">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5717">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5717">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5718">L’expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5718">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5719">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5719">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5720">L’expression régulière trouve la date au `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` format DD MMM/MMM AA (exemple - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) ou un mot clé trouvé `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5720">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5721">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5721">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5722">L’expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5722">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5723">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5723">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5743">Numéro de sécurité sociale hongrois (TAJ)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5743">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5745">Neuf chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5745">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5746">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5747">Neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5747">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5748">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5749">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5749">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5750">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5751">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5752">La fonction  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5752">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5753">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5753">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-5754">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5754">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5755">La fonction  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5755">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5775">Numéro d’identification fiscale hongrie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5775">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-5776">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5776">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5777">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5777">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5778">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5778">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5779">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5779">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5780">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5780">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5781">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5781">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5782">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5783">10 chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5783">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5784">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5785">10 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5785">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5786">Un chiffre qui doit être « 8 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5786">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5787">Huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5787">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5788">Un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5788">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5789">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5790">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5790">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5791">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5792">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5792">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5793">La fonction  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5793">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5794">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5794">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-5795">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5795">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5796">La fonction  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5796">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5823">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5824">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5829">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5829">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5831">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5832">Modèle alphanumérique de 10 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5832">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5839">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5839">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5840">La fonction Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5840">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5841">Un mot clé de Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5841">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5843">La fonction Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5843">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5857">Numéro de compte permanent Inde (PAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5857">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5858">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5859">10 lettres ou chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5859">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5860">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5860">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5861">10 lettres ou chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5861">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5862">Trois lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5862">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5863">Lettre en C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (ne sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5863">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5864">Une lettre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5864">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5865">Quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5865">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5866">Une lettre qui est un chiffre de vérification alphabétique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5866">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5867">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5867">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5868">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5868">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5869">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5869">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5870">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5870">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5871">L’expression régulière Regex_india_permanent_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5871">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5872">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_india_permanent_account_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5872">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5873">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5873">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5874">L’expression régulière Regex_india_permanent_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5874">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5875">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5875">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5876">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5876">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5877">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5877">Permanent Account Number</span></span>

## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5879">Numéro d’identification unique inde (Aadhaar)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5879">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5881">12 chiffres contenant éventuellement des espaces ou des tirets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5881">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5882">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5883">12 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5883">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5884">Un chiffre qui n’est pas 0 ou 1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5884">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5885">Trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5885">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5886">Éventuellement un tiret ou un espace </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5886">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5887">Quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5887">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5888">Éventuellement un tiret ou un espace </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5888">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5889">Chiffre final, qui est le chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5889">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5890">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5891">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5891">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5892">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5893">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5893">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5894">La fonction Func_india_aadhaar trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5894">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5895">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_india_aadhar est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5895">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5896">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5896">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="57723-5897">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5897">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5898">La fonction Func_india_aadhaar trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5898">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5899">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5899">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5908">Numéro de carte d’identité (KTP) indonésie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5908">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5909">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5910">16 chiffres contenant éventuellement des points</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5910">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5911">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5912">16 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5912">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5913">Code à deux chiffres désignant la province </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5913">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5914">Un point (facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5914">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5915">Code à deux chiffres désignant une régence ou une ville </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5915">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5916">Code à deux chiffres désignant un sous-district </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5916">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5917">Un point (facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5917">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5918">Six chiffres au format DDMMYY, qui sont la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5918">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5919">Un point (facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5919">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5920">Quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5920">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5921">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5921">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5922">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5922">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5923">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5923">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5924">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5924">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5925">L’expression régulière Regex_indonesia_id_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5925">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5926">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_indonesia_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5926">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5927">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5927">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5928">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5928">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5931">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5931">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5932">Numéro de compte bancaire international (IBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5932">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5933">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5933">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5934">Code pays (à deux lettres) plus chiffres de contrôle (à deux chiffres) plus numéro BBAN (jusqu’à 30 chiffres)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5934">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5935">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5935">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5936">Le modèle doit inclure tous les éléments suivants :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5936">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5937">Code pays à deux lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5937">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5938">Deux chiffres de contrôle (suivis d’un espace facultatif) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5938">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5939">1 à 7 groupes de quatre lettres ou chiffres (séparés par des espaces facultatifs)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5939">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5940">1 à 3 lettres ou chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5940">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-p137">Le format pour chaque pays est légèrement différent. Le type d’informations sensibles IBAN recouvre ces 60 pays :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-p137">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5944">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5945">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5945">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5946">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5947">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5948">La fonction Func_iban trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5948">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5949">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5949">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5951">Aucune</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5951">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5952">Classification internationale des maladie (ICD-10-CM)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5952">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5953">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5953">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5954">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5954">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5955">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5956">Mot clé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5956">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5957">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5958">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5958">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5959">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5960">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5960">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5972">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5972">Dictionary</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5978">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5978">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5980">Un mot clé de Dictionary_icd_9_codes est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5980">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5981">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5982">Un mot clé de Dictionary_icd_9_updated est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5982">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5983">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5983">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5988">Adresse IP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5988">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5989">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5989">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5990">IPv4 :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5990">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-5991">Modèle complexe qui prend en compte les versions formatées (périodes) et non formatées (sans point) des adresses IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5991">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5992">IPv6 :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5992">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-5993">Modèle complexe qui compte pour les nombres IPv6 formatés (qui incluent les deux-points)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5993">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5994">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5994">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5995">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5995">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5996">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5996">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-5997">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5997">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-5998">Pour IPv6, une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5998">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-5999">L’expression régulière Regex_ipv6_address trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-5999">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6000">Aucun mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ipaddress n’est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6000">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6001">Pour IPv4, une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6001">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6002">L’expression régulière Regex_ipv4_address trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6002">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6003">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ipaddress est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6003">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6004">Pour IPv6, une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6004">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6005">L’expression régulière Regex_ipv6_address trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6005">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6006">Aucun mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ipaddress n’est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6006">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
