## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6014">Numéro de permis de conduire irlande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6014">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6016">Six chiffres suivis de quatre lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6016">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6017">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6018">Six chiffres et quatre lettres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6018">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6019">Six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6019">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6020">Quatre lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6020">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6021">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6021">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6022">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6022">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6023">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6023">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6024">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6024">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6025">L’expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6025">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6026">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6026">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6150">Numéro de passeport irlande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6150">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6151">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6152">Deux lettres ou chiffres suivis de sept chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6152">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6153">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6154">Deux lettres ou chiffres suivis de sept chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6154">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6155">Deux chiffres ou lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6155">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6156">Sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6156">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6157">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6157">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6158">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6158">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6159">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6159">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6160">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6160">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6161">L’expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6161">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6162">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6162">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6163">L’expression régulière trouve la date au `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` format DD MMM/MMM AAA (exemple - 01 BEA/MAI 1988) ou un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6163">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6164">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6165">L’expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6165">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6166">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6166">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6190">Numéro de service public personnel (PPS) irlande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6190">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6191">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6192">Ancien format (jusqu’au 31 décembre 2012) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6192">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6193">sept chiffres suivis de 1 à 2 lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6193">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6194">Nouveau format (1er janvier 2013 et après) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6194">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6195">sept chiffres suivis de deux lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6195">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6196">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6197">Ancien format (jusqu’au 31 décembre 2012) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6197">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6198">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6198">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6199">une à deux lettres (ne pas prendre en compte la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6199">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6200">Nouveau format (1er janvier 2013 et après) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6200">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6201">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6201">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6202">une lettre (ne sensible à la cas) qui est un chiffre de vérification alphabétique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6202">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6203">Lettre facultative de la plage A-I ou « W »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6203">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6204">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6205">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6205">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6206">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6207">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6207">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6208">La fonction Func_ireland_pps trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6208">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6209">Un mot clé de Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6209">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6210">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6211">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6211">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6212">La fonction Func_ireland_pps trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6212">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6213">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6213">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6258">Numéro de compte bancaire Israël</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6258">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6259">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6259">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6260">13 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6260">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6261">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6261">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6262">Formaté :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6262">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6263">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6263">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6264">un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6264">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6265">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6265">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6266">un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6266">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6267">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6267">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6268">Non formaté :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6268">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6269">	13 chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6269">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6270">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6271">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6271">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6272">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6273">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6273">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6274">L’expression régulière Regex_israel_bank_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6274">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6275">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_israel_bank_account_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6275">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6276">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6276">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6277">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6277">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6278">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6278">Bank Account Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6281">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6281">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6282">Numéro d’identification national Israël</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6282">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6283">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6284">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6284">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6285">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6286">neuf chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6286">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6287">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6287">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6288">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6288">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6289">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6289">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6290">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6290">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6291">La fonction Func_israeli_national_id_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6291">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6292">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_Israel_National_ID est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6292">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6293">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6293">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6294">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6294">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6295">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6295">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="57723-6296">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6296">מספר זהות</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="57723-6297">מספר זיה וי</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6297">מספר זיה וי</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="57723-6298">מספר זיהוי ישר אלי</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6298">מספר זיהוי ישר אלי</span></span>      
-   <span data-ttu-id="57723-6299">זהותישר אלית</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6299">זהותישר אלית</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="57723-6300">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6300">هو ية اسرائيل ية عدد</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="57723-6301">هوية إسرائ يلية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6301">هوية إسرائ يلية</span></span>

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6312">Numéro de permis de conduire Italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6312">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6313">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles Numéro de permis de conduire de l’UE et est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6313">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6314">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6314">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6315">combinaison de 10 lettres et chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6315">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6316">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6316">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6317">Combinaison de 10 lettres et chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6317">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6318">une lettre (ne doit pas être sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6318">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6319">la lettre « A » ou « V » (ne sensible pas à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6319">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6320">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6320">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6321">une lettre (ne doit pas être sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6321">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6322">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6323">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6323">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6324">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6325">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6326">L’expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6326">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6327">Mot clé à partir `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6327">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6454">Code fiscal italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6454">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-6455">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6455">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6456">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6456">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6457">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6457">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6458">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6458">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6459">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6459">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6460">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6460">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6461">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6462">combinaison de 16 caractères de lettres et de chiffres dans le modèle spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6462">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6463">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6464">Combinaison de 16 caractères de lettres et de chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6464">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6465">trois lettres qui correspondent aux trois premières consonnes dans le nom de famille</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6465">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6466">trois lettres qui correspondent à la première, la troisième et la quatrième consonne du prénom</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6466">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6467">deux chiffres qui correspondent aux derniers chiffres de l’année de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6467">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6468">une lettre qui correspond à la lettre du mois de naissance : les lettres sont utilisées dans l’ordre alphabétique, mais seules les lettres A à E, H, L, M, P, R à T sont utilisées (donc, Janvier est A et Octobre est R)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6468">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6469">deux chiffres qui correspondent au jour du mois de naissance ; afin de différencier les sexes, 40 sont ajoutés au jour de naissance des enfants</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6469">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6470">quatre chiffres qui correspondent à l’indicatif de zone spécifique à l’endroit où la personne est né (les codes nationaux sont utilisés pour les pays étrangers)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6470">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6471">un chiffre de parité</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6471">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6472">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6472">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6473">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6473">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6474">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6474">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6475">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6475">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6476">La fonction  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6476">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6477">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6477">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-6478">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6478">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6479">La fonction  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6479">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6514">Numéro de passeport Italien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6514">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6515">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6516">deux lettres ou chiffres suivis de sept chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6516">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6517">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6518">deux lettres ou chiffres suivis de sept chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6518">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6519">deux chiffres ou lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule) ;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6519">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6520">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6520">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6521">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6521">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6522">non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6522">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6523">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6523">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6524">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6524">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6525">L’expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6525">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6526">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6526">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6527">L’expression régulière trouve la date au `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` format DD MMM/MMM AAAY (exemple - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) ou un mot clé trouvé `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6527">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6528">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6528">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6529">L’expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6529">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6530">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6530">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_italy_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6543">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6543">Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6544">italianantporto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6544">italiana passaporto</span></span>

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6554">Numéro de taxe sur la valeur ajoutée italie</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6554">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-6555">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6555">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6556">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6556">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6557">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6557">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6558">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6558">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6559">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6559">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6560">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6560">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6561">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6562">Modèle alphanumérique de 13 caractères avec délimiteur facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6562">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6563">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6564">Modèle alphanumérique de 13 caractères avec des délimiteur facultatifs :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6564">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6565">I ou i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6565">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6566">T ou t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6566">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6567">espace facultatif, point, trait d’union ou virgule</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6567">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6568">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6568">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6569">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6570">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6570">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6571">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6572">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6572">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6573">La fonction Func_italy_value_added_tax_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6573">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6574">Un mot clé de Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6574">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6575">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6575">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6576">La fonction Func_italy_value_added_tax_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6576">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6578">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6578">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6584">Numéro de compte bancaire Japon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6584">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6585">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6586">sept ou huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6586">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6587">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6588">Numéro de compte bancaire :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6588">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6589">sept ou huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6589">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6590">Code de succursale de compte bancaire :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6590">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6591">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6591">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6592">un espace ou un tiret (facultatif) ;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6592">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6593">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6593">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6594">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6594">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6595">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6595">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6596">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6596">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6597">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6597">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6598">La fonction Func_jp_bank_account trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6598">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6599">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_jp_bank_account est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6599">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6600">L’une des affirmations suivantes est vraie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6600">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6601">La fonction Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6601">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6602">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6602">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6603">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6603">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6604">La fonction Func_jp_bank_account trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6604">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6605">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_jp_bank_account est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6605">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6652">Numéro de permis de conduire Japon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6652">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6653">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6654">12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6654">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6655">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6656">12 chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6656">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6657">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6658">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6659">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6660">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6660">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6661">La fonction Func_jp_drivers_license_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6661">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6700">Japan My Number - Corporate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6700">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-6701">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6701">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6702">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6702">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6703">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6703">communication compliance policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6707">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6707">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6708">Nombre à 13 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6708">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6709">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6709">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6710">Nombre à 13 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6710">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6711">un chiffre d’un à neuf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6711">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6712">12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6712">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6713">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6714">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6714">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6715">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6716">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6716">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6717">La fonction Func_japanese_my_number_corporate trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6717">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6718">Un mot clé de Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6718">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6719">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6719">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6720">La fonction Func_japanese_my_number_corporate trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6720">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6769">Numéro de passeport Japon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6769">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6770">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6770">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6771">deux lettres suivies de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6771">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6772">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6772">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6773">deux lettres (ne faisant pas l’affaire) suivies de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6773">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6774">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6774">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6775">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6775">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6776">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6776">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6777">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6777">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6778">La fonction Func_jp_passport trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6778">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6796">Numéro de carte de résidence Japon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6796">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6797">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6798">12 lettres et chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6798">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6799">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6800">12 lettres et chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6800">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6801">deux lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6801">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6802">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6802">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6803">deux lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6803">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6804">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6805">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6806">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6807">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6808">L’expression régulière Regex_jp_residence_card_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6808">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6809">Un mot clé de Keyword_jp_residence_card_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6809">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6818">Numéro d’enregistrement du résident japonais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6818">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6819">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6820">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6820">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6821">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6822">11 chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6822">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6823">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6823">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6825">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6826">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6826">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6827">La fonction Func_jp_resident_registration_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6827">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6828">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6828">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6841">Numéro d’assurance sociale Japon (SIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6841">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6842">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6843">7 à 12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6843">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6844">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6844">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6845">7 à 12 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6845">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6846">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6846">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6847">un trait d’union (facultatif) ;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6847">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6848">SIX chiffres OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6848">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6849">7 à 12 chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6849">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6850">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6851">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6851">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6852">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6853">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6853">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6854">La fonction Func_jp_sin trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6854">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6855">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_jp_sin est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6855">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6856">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6857">La fonction Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6857">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6858">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_jp_sin est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6858">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6879">Numéro de permis de conduire letton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6879">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6881">trois lettres suivies de six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6881">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6882">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6883">trois lettres et six chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6883">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6884">trois lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6884">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6885">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6885">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6886">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6886">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6887">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6887">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-6888">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6888">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-6889">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6889">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6890">L’expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6890">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-6891">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-6891">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7016">Code personnel letton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7016">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7017">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7018">11 chiffres et un trait d’union facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7018">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7019">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7019">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7020">Ancien format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7020">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7021">11 chiffres et un trait d’union :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7021">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7022">six chiffres qui correspondent à la date de naissance (DDMMYY)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7022">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7023">un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7023">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7024">un chiffre qui correspond au xxe anniversaire de naissance ( « 0 » pour le 19e s., « 1 » pour le XXe et « 2 » pour le 21e s.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7024">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7025">quatre chiffres, générés de manière aléatoire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7025">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7026">Nouveau format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7026">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7027">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7027">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7028">Deux chiffres « 32 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7028">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7029">Neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7029">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7030">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7030">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7031">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7031">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7032">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7032">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7033">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7033">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7034">La fonction  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` ou l’regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7034">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7035">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7035">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-7036">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7037">La fonction  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` ou l’regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7037">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```
