## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7100">Numéro de passeport letton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7100">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7101">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7102">deux lettres ou chiffres suivis de sept chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7102">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7103">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7104">deux lettres ou chiffres suivis de sept chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7104">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7105">deux chiffres ou lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule) ;</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7105">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7106">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7106">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7107">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7108">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7108">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7109">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7110">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7111">L’expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7111">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7112">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7113">L’expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` régulière trouve la date au format DD.MM.YYYY ou dans laquelle un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7113">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7114">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7114">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7115">L’expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7115">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7116">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7116">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7129">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7129">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7139">Numéro de permis de conduire lituanien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7139">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7140">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7141">huit chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7141">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7142">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7143">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7143">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7144">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7144">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7145">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7145">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7146">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7146">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7147">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7147">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7148">L’expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7148">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7149">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7149">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7274">Code personnel lituanien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7274">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-7275">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7275">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7276">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7276">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7277">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7277">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7278">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7278">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7279">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7279">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7280">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7280">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7281">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7282">11 chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7282">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7283">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7284">11 chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7284">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7285">un chiffre (1-6) qui correspond au sexe et au century de naissance de la personne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7285">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7286">six chiffres qui correspondent à la date de naissance (AAMMMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7286">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7287">trois chiffres qui correspondent au numéro de série de la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7287">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7288">un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7288">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7289">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7290">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7290">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7291">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7292">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7292">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7293">La fonction  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7293">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7294">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7294">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-7295">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7295">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7296">La fonction  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7296">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7331">Numéro de passeport lituanien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7331">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7332">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7333">huit chiffres ou lettres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7333">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7334">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7335">huit chiffres ou lettres (ne sensibles pas à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7335">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7336">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7337">non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7337">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7338">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7339">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7339">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7340">L’expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7340">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7341">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7341">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7342">L’expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` régulière trouve la date au format MM AAA OU un mot clé à partir de laquelle est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7342">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7343">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7343">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7344">L’expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7344">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7345">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7345">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7365">Numéro de permis de conduire De Qu’est-ce que vous avez ?</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7365">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7366">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7367">six chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7367">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7368">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7369">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7369">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7370">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7371">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7371">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7372">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7373">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7373">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7374">L’expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7374">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7375">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7375">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7507">13 chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7507">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7508">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7509">13 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7509">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7510">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7510">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7511">deux chiffres de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7511">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7512">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7513">oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7513">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7514">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7515">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7515">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7516">La fonction  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7516">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7517">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7517">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7518">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7518">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7519">La fonction  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7519">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7542">Numéro de passeport Dem passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7542">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7543">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7544">huit chiffres ou lettres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7544">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7545">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7546">huit chiffres ou lettres (ne sensibles pas à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7546">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7547">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7547">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7548">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7548">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7549">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7549">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7550">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7550">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7551">L’expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7551">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7552">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7552">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7553">L’expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` régulière trouve la date au format MM AAA OU un mot clé à partir de laquelle est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7553">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7554">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7554">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7555">L’expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7555">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7556">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7556">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7588">Numéro d’identification national (personnes non physiques)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7588">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7589">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7589">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7590">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7590">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7591">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7591">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7592">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7592">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7593">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7594">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7594">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7595">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7595">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7596">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7596">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7597">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7597">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7598">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7598">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7599">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7599">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7600">un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7600">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7601">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7602">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7602">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7603">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7604">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7604">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7605">La fonction  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7605">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7606">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7606">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-7607">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7607">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7608">La fonction  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7608">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7609">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7609">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7610">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7610">Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7611">carte de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7611">carte de sécurité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7612">2013 non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7612">étain non</span></span>

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7648">Numéro de carte d’identification malaisien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7648">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7649">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7649">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7650">12 chiffres contenant éventuellement des traits d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7650">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7651">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7651">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7652">12 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7652">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7653">six chiffres au format AAMMMMD, qui sont la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7653">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7654">un tiret (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7654">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7655">code de lieu de naissance à deux lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7655">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7656">un tiret (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7656">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7657">trois chiffres aléatoires</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7657">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7658">code de sexe à un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7658">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7659">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7660">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7661">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7662">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7662">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7663">L’expression régulière Regex_malaysia_id_card_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7663">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7664">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7664">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7691">Numéro de permis de conduire de Malte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7691">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7692">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7693">Combinaison de deux caractères et six chiffres dans le modèle spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7693">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7694">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7695">combinaison de deux caractères et six chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7695">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7696">deux caractères (chiffres ou lettres, ne sensibles pas à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7696">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7697">un espace (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7697">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7698">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7698">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7699">un espace (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7699">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7700">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7700">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7701">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7702">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7702">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7703">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7704">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7705">L’expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7705">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7706">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7830">Numéro de carte d’identité de Malte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7830">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-7831">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7831">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7832">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7832">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7833">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7833">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7834">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7834">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7835">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7835">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7836">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7836">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7837">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7838">sept chiffres suivis d’une lettre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7838">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7839">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7840">sept chiffres suivis d’une lettre :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7840">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7841">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7841">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7842">une lettre dans « M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z » (ne sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7842">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7843">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7844">Non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7844">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7845">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7846">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7847">L’expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7847">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7848">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7848">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-7849">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7849">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7850">L’expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7850">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7868">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7869">sept chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7869">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7870">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7871">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7871">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7872">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7873">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7873">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7874">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7875">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7876">L’expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7876">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7877">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7877">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7878">Un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7878">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7879">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7879">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7880">L’expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7880">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7881">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7881">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7901">Numéro d’identification fiscale de Malte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7901">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7902">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7903">Pour les national(s) d’unité nationale(s) :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7903">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7904">sept chiffres et une lettre dans le modèle spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7904">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="57723-7905">Personnes étrangères et entités américaines :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7905">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7906">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7906">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7907">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7908">Nationals malaux : sept chiffres et une lettre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7908">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7909">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7909">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7910">une lettre (ne doit pas être sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7910">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-7911">Personnes étrangères et entités locales : neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7911">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7912">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7912">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7913">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7914">Non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7914">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7915">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7916">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7916">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7917">L’regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  ou trouve le contenu qui correspond au `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7917">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7918">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7918">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-7919">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7919">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7920">L’regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` ou trouve le contenu qui correspond au `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7920">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7953">Carte d’identificateur de bénéficiaire de programme (MBI)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7953">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7954">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7954">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7955">motif alphanumérique de caractères 11</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7955">eleven character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7956">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7956">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7957">un chiffre entre 1 et 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7957">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7958">une lettre à l’exclusion de S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7958">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7959">un chiffre ou une lettre à l’exclusion de S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7959">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7960">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7960">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7961">trait d’union facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7961">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7962">une lettre à l’exclusion de S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7962">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7963">un chiffre ou une lettre à l’exclusion de S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7963">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7964">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7964">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7965">trait d’union facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7965">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7966">deux lettres à l’exclusion de S, L, O, I, B, Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7966">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7967">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7967">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7968">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7968">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7969">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7969">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7970">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7970">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7971">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7971">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7972">L’expression  `Regex_mbi_card` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7972">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7973">Un mot clé est  `Keyword_mbi_card` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7973">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-7974">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7974">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7975">L’expression  `Regex_mbi_card` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7975">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7985">Code curp (Unique Population Registry Code) du Mexique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7985">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7986">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7986">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7987">Modèle alphanumérique de 18 caractères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7987">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7988">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7988">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7989">quatre lettres (ne sensibles à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7989">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7990">six chiffres indiquant une date valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7990">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7991">une lettre - H/h ou M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7991">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7992">deux lettres indiquant un code d’état américain valide</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7992">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7993">trois lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7993">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7994">une lettre ou un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7994">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-7995">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7995">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7996">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7996">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7997">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7997">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-7998">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7998">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-7999">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-7999">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8000">La fonction  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8000">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8001">Un mot clé est  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8001">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-8002">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8002">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8003">La fonction  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8003">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8024">Numéro de service des citoyens (BSN) des Pays-Bas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8024">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8025">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8025">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8026">huit ou neuf chiffres contenant des espaces facultatifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8026">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8027">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8027">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8028">huit à neuf chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8028">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8029">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8029">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8030">un espace (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8030">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8031">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8031">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8032">un espace (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8032">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8033">deux-trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8033">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8034">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8034">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8035">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8035">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8036">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8036">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8037">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8037">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8038">La fonction Func_netherlands_bsn trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8038">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8039">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_netherlands_bsn est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8039">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8040">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8040">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8064">Numéro de permis de conduire néerlandais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8064">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8065">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8066">dix chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8066">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8067">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8067">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8068">dix chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8068">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8069">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8069">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8070">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8070">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8071">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8071">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8072">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8072">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8073">L’expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8073">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8074">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8074">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8202">Numéro de passeport néerlandais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8202">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8203">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8204">neuf lettres ou chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8204">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8205">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8206">neuf lettres ou chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8206">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8207">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8207">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8208">non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8208">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8209">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8209">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8210">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8210">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8211">L’expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8211">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8212">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8212">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8213">L’expression régulière trouve la date au `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` format JMM/AAAMM JMM (exemple - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8213">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8214">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8214">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8215">L’expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8215">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8216">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8216">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8217">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8217">Keywords</span></span>
