## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8234">Numéro d’identification fiscale pays-Bas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8234">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-8235">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8235">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8236">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8236">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8237">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8237">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8238">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8238">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8239">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8239">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8240">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8240">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8241">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8242">neuf chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8242">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8243">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8244">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8244">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8245">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8246">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8246">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8247">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8248">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8249">La fonction  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8249">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8250">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8250">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-8251">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8251">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8252">La fonction  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8252">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8290">Numéro de taxe sur la valeur ajoutée des Pays-Bas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8290">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-8291">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8291">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8292">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8292">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8293">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8293">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8294">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8294">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8295">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8295">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8296">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8296">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8297">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8297">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8298">Modèle alphanumérique de 14 caractères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8298">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8299">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8299">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8300">Modèle alphanumérique de 14 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8300">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8301">N ou n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8301">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8302">L ou l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8302">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8303">espace facultatif, point ou trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8303">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8304">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8304">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8305">espace facultatif, point ou trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8305">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8306">B ou b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8306">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8307">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8307">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8308">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8308">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8309">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8309">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8310">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8310">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8311">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8311">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8312">La fonction Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8312">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8313">Un mot clé de Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8313">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8314">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8314">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8315">La fonction Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8315">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8325">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8325">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8326">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8326">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8327">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8327">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8329">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8329">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8330">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8330">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8331">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8332">Modèle de 14 à 16 chiffres avec délimiteur facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8332">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8333">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8334">Modèle de 14 à 16 chiffres avec délimiteur facultatif :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8334">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8335">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8335">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8336">trait d’union ou espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8336">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8337">trois à quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8337">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8338">trait d’union ou espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8338">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8339">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8339">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8340">trait d’union ou espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8340">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8341">deux à trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8341">two to three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8343">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8343">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8344">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8344">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8345">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8346">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8346">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8347">La fonction Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8347">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8348">Un mot clé de Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8348">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8349">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8349">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8350">La fonction Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8350">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

```xml
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8446">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8446">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8458">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8458">three digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8460">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8460">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8461">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8462">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8462">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8463">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8464">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8464">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8465">La fonction Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8465">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8466">Un mot clé de Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8466">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8467">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8467">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8468">La fonction Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8468">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8477">Numéro de santé du ministère de la Nouvelle-Zélande</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8477">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8478">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8479">trois lettres, un espace (facultatif) et quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8479">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8480">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8480">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8481">trois lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule) à l’exception de « I » et « O »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8481">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8482">un espace (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8482">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8483">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8483">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8484">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8485">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8486">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8487">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8488">La fonction Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8488">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8489">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_nz_terms est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8489">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8490">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8491">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8492">La fonction Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8492">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8493">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8493">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8508">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8508">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8519">un trait d’union facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8519">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8520">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8520">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8521">un trait d’union facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8521">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8522">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8522">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8523">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8524">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8524">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8525">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8526">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8526">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8527">La fonction Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8527">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8528">Un mot clé de Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8528">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8529">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8530">La fonction Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8530">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8538">Numéro d’identification norvégien</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8538">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8539">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8540">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8540">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8541">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8542">11 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8542">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8543">six chiffres au format DDMMYY qui sont la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8543">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8544">numéro individuel à trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8544">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8545">deux chiffres de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8545">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8546">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8547">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8547">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8548">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8549">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8549">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8550">La fonction Func_norway_id_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8550">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8551">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_norway_id_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8551">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8552">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8552">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8553">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8553">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8554">La fonction Func_norway_id_numbe trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8554">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8555">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8555">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8564">Numéro d’identification multi-usage unifié philippines</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8564">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8565">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8566">12 chiffres séparés par des traits d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8566">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8567">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8568">12 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8568">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8569">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8569">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8570">un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8570">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8571">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8571">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8572">un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8572">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8573">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8573">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8574">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8574">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8575">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8575">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8576">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8576">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8577">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8577">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8578">L’expression régulière Regex_philippines_unified_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8578">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8579">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_philippines_id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8579">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8580">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8580">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8582">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8582">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8583">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8583">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8584">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8584">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8585">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8585">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8586">Numéro de permis de conduire polonais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8586">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8587">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8588">14 chiffres contenant deux barres obliques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8588">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8589">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8590">14 chiffres et deux barres obliques :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8590">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8591">cinq chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8591">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8592">barre oblique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8592">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8593">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8594">barre oblique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8594">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8595">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8595">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8596">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8596">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8597">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8597">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8598">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8598">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8599">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8599">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8600">L’expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8600">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8601">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8601">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8725">Carte d’identité pologne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8725">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8726">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8726">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8727">trois lettres et six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8727">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8728">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8728">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8729">trois lettres (ne faisant pas l’affaire) suivies de six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8729">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8730">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8731">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8731">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8732">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8733">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8734">La fonction Func_polish_national_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8734">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8735">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8735">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8736">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8747">ID national polonais (PESEL)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8747">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8748">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8749">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8749">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8750">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8750">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8751">six chiffres représentant la date de naissance au format AAMMMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8751">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8752">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8752">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8753">un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8753">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8754">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8754">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8755">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8755">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8756">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8756">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8757">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8757">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8758">La fonction Func_pesel_identification_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8758">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8759">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_pesel_identification_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8759">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8760">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8760">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8761">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8761">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8762">La fonction Func_pesel_identification_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8762">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8763">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8763">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8775">Numéro de passeport polonais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8775">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-8776">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles Numéro de passeport de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8776">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="57723-8777">Il est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8777">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8778">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8778">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8779">deux lettres et sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8779">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8780">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8780">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8781">Deux lettres (ne faisant pas l’affaire) suivies de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8781">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8782">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8782">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8783">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8783">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8784">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8784">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8785">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8785">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8786">La fonction `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8786">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8787">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8787">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8788">Mot clé à partir `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8788">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8789">Un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8789">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8790">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8790">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8791">La fonction `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8791">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8792">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8792">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8793">Mot clé à partir `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8793">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8794">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8795">La fonction `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8795">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8796">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8822">Numéro reGON polonais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8822">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-8823">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8824">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8825">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8826">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8827">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8828">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8829">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8830">Nombre à 9 chiffres ou 14 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8830">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8831">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8832">neuf chiffres ou 14 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8832">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8833">neuf chiffres ou</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8833">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8834">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8834">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8835">trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8835">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8836">cinq chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8836">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8837">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8838">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8838">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8839">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8840">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8840">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8841">La fonction Func_polish_regon_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8841">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8842">Un mot clé de Keywords_polish_regon_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8842">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8843">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8843">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8844">La fonction Func_polish_regon_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8844">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8861">Numéro d’identification fiscale polonais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8861">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-8862">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8862">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8863">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8863">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8864">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8864">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8865">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8865">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8866">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8866">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8867">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8867">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8868">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8869">11 chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8869">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8870">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8871">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8871">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8872">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8873">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8873">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8874">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8875">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8876">La fonction  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8876">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8877">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8877">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8907">Numéro de carte de citoyen portugais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8907">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8908">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8908">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8909">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8909">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8910">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8910">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8911">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8911">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8912">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8913">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8913">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8914">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8915">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8915">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8916">L’expression régulière Regex_portugal_citizen_card trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8916">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8917">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_portugal_citizen_card est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8917">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8937">Numéro de permis de conduire Portugal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8937">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8938">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8939">deux modèles - deux lettres suivies de 5 à 8 chiffres avec des caractères spéciaux</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8939">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8940">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8941">Modèle 1 : deux lettres suivies de 5/6 avec des caractères spéciaux :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8941">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8942">Deux lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8942">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8943">Un trait d’union </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8943">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8944">Cinq ou six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8944">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8945">Un espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8945">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8946">Un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8946">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8947">Modèle 2 : Une lettre suivie de 6/8 chiffres avec des caractères spéciaux :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8947">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8948">Une lettre (ne doit pas être sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8948">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8949">Un trait d’union </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8949">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8950">Six ou huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8950">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8951">Un espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8951">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8952">Un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8952">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8953">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8953">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8954">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8954">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-8955">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8955">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-8956">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8956">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8957">L’expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8957">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-8958">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-8958">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9090">Numéro de passeport portugais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9090">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9091">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9092">une lettre suivie de six chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9092">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9093">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9094">une lettre suivie de six chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9094">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9095">une lettre (ne doit pas être sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9095">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9096">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9096">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9097">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9098">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9098">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9099">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9100">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9100">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9101">L’expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9101">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9102">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9102">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9103">L’expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` régulière trouve la date au format DD.MM.YYYY ou dans laquelle un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9103">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9104">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9104">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9105">L’expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9105">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9106">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9106">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9133">Numéro d’identification fiscale portugais</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9133">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9134">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9135">neuf chiffres avec espaces facultatifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9135">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9136">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9136">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9137">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9137">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9138">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9138">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9139">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9139">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9140">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9140">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9141">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9141">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9142">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9143">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9143">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9144">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9145">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9145">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9146">La fonction  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9146">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9147">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9147">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-9148">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9148">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9149">La fonction  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9149">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9174">Numéro de permis de conduire roumain</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9174">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9175">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9175">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9176">un caractère suivi de huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9176">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9177">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9177">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9178">un caractère suivi de huit chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9178">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9179">une lettre (ne sensible pas à la cas) ou un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9179">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9180">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9180">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9181">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9182">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9182">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9183">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9184">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9184">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9185">L’expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9185">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9186">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9186">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
