## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9314">Code numérique personnel roumain (CNP)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9314">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-9315">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9315">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9316">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9316">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9317">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9317">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9318">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9318">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9319">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9319">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9320">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9320">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9321">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9321">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9322">13 chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9322">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9323">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9323">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9324">un chiffre de 1 à 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9324">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9325">six chiffres représentant la date de naissance (AAMMMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9325">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9326">deux chiffres, qui peuvent être 01-52 ou 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9326">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9327">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9327">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9328">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9329">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9329">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9330">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9331">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9331">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9332">La fonction  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9332">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9333">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9333">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-9334">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9334">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9335">La fonction  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9335">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9386">Numéro de passeport roumain</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9386">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9388">huit ou neuf chiffres sans espace et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9388">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9389">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9390">huit ou neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9390">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9391">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9392">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9392">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9393">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9394">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9394">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9395">L’expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9395">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9396">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9397">L’expression régulière trouve la date au `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` format DD MMM/MMM AA (Exemple - 01 février/10 février) ou un mot clé trouvé `Keywords_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9397">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9398">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9399">L’expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9399">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9400">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9400">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9419">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9419">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9420">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9420">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9421">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9421">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9422">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9422">information governance</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9424">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9424">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9426">Nombre à 10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9426">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9427">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9427">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9430">espace ou trait d’union facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9430">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9431">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9431">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9432">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9432">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9433">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9433">six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9435">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9435">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9437">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9437">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9438">L’Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic regex trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9438">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9492">ID national Arabie saoudite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9492">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9493">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9494">10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9494">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9495">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9496">10 chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9496">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9497">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9498">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9498">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9499">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9500">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9501">L’expression régulière Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9501">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9502">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9502">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9509">Numéro de carte d’identité d’inscription nationale (NRIC) Singapour</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9509">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9510">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9510">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9511">neuf lettres et chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9511">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9512">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9512">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9513">neuf lettres et chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9513">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9514">la lettre « F », « G », « S » ou « T » (ne sensible pas à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9514">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9515">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9515">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9516">un chiffre de vérification alphabétique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9516">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9517">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9518">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9519">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9520">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9521">L’expression régulière Regex_singapore_nric trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9521">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9522">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_singapore_nric est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9522">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9523">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9524">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9525">L’expression régulière Regex_singapore_nric trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9525">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9526">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9526">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9538">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9539">un caractère suivi de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9539">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9540">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9541">un caractère suivi de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9541">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9542">une lettre (ne sensible pas à la cas) ou un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9542">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9543">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9543">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9544">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9545">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9545">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9546">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9547">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9547">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9548">L’expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9548">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9549">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9549">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9675">Numéro personnel slovaque</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9675">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-9676">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9676">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9677">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9677">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9678">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9678">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9679">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9679">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9680">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9680">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9681">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9681">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9683">neuf ou dix chiffres contenant une barre oblique inverse facultative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9683">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9684">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9684">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9685">six chiffres représentant la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9685">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9686">barre oblique facultative (/)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9686">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9687">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9687">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9688">un chiffre de vérification facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9688">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9689">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9690">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9690">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9691">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9692">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9692">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9693">La fonction  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9693">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9694">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9694">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-9695">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9695">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9696">La fonction  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9696">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9743">Numéro de passeport slovaque</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9743">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9745">un chiffre ou une lettre suivi de sept chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9745">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9746">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9747">un chiffre ou une lettre (ne sensible à la cas) suivi de sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9747">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9748">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9749">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9749">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9750">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9751">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9752">L’expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9752">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9753">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9753">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9754">L’expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` régulière trouve la date au format DD.MM.YYYY ou dans laquelle un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9754">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9755">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9755">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9756">L’expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9756">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9757">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9757">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9779">Numéro de permis de conduire slovène</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9779">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9781">neuf chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9781">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9782">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9783">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9783">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9784">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9784">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9785">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9785">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9786">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9786">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9787">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9787">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9788">L’expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9788">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9789">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9789">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9920">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9920">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9921">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9921">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9922">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9922">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9923">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9923">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9924">13 chiffres sans espaces ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9924">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9925">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9925">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9926">13 chiffres dans le modèle spécifié :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9926">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9927">sept chiffres qui correspondent à la date de naissance (DDMMLLL) où « LLL » correspond aux trois derniers chiffres de l’année de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9927">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9928">deux chiffres qui correspondent à la zone de naissance « 50 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9928">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9929">trois chiffres qui correspondent à une combinaison de sexe et de numéro de série pour les personnes qui sont enfants le même jour (000-499 pour les hommes et 500-999 pour les femme)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9929">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9930">un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9930">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9931">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9932">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9932">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9933">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9934">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9934">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9935">La fonction  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9935">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9936">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9936">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-9937">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9937">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9938">La fonction  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9938">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9966">Numéro de passeport slovène</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9966">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9967">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9968">deux lettres suivies de sept chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9968">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9969">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9970">deux lettres suivies de sept chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9970">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9971">la lettre « P »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9971">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9972">une lettre en lettres minuscules</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9972">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9973">sept chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9973">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9974">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9975">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9975">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-9976">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9977">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9977">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9978">L’expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9978">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9979">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9979">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9980">L’expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` régulière trouve la date au format DD.MM.YYYY ou dans laquelle un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9980">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-9981">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9982">L’expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9982">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-9983">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-9983">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10006">Numéro d’identification fiscale slovène</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10006">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-10007">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10007">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10008">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10008">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10009">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10009">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10010">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10010">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10011">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10011">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10012">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10012">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10013">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10014">huit chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10014">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10015">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10015">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10016">un chiffre de 1 à 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10016">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10017">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10017">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10018">un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10018">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10019">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10020">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10020">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10021">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10022">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10022">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10023">La fonction  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10023">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10024">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10024">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-10025">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10025">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10026">La fonction  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10026">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10050">Numéro d’identification Afrique du Sud</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10050">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10051">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10052">13 chiffres pouvant contenir des espaces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10052">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10053">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10054">13 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10054">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10055">six chiffres au format AAMMMMD, qui sont la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10055">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10056">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10056">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10057">un indicateur de nationalité à un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10057">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10058">chiffre « 8 » ou « 9 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10058">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10059">un chiffre, qui est un chiffre de la checksum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10059">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10060">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10061">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10061">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10062">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10063">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10063">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10064">La fonction Func_south_africa_identification_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10064">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10065">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_south_africa_identification_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10065">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10066">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10066">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10072">Numéro d’enregistrement d’un résident sud-coréen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10072">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10073">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10074">13 chiffres contenant un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10074">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10075">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10076">13 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10076">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10077">six chiffres au format AAMMMMD, qui sont la date de naissance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10077">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10078">un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10078">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10079">un chiffre déterminé par le xème et le sexe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10079">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10080">Code de région de naissance à quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10080">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10081">un chiffre utilisé pour différencier les personnes pour lesquelles les chiffres précédents sont identiques</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10081">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10082">un chiffre de contrôle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10082">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10083">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10084">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10084">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10085">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10086">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10086">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10087">La fonction Func_south_korea_resident_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10087">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10088">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_south_korea_resident_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10088">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10089">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10089">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10090">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10090">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10091">La fonction Func_south_korea_resident_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10091">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10092">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10092">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10094">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10094">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10100">Numéro de permis de conduire espagnol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10100">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10101">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10102">huit chiffres suivis d’un caractère</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10102">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10103">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10104">huit chiffres suivis d’un caractère :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10104">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10105">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10105">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10106">un chiffre ou une lettre (ne pas sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10106">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10107">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10108">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10108">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10109">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10110">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10111">La fonction  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ou trouve un contenu qui correspond au `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10111">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10112">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10113">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10113">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10114">La fonction  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ou trouve un contenu qui correspond au `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10114">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10248">DNI (Espagne)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10248">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-10249">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10249">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10250">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10250">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10251">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10251">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10252">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10252">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10253">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10253">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10254">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10254">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10255">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10256">huit chiffres suivis d’un caractère</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10256">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10257">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10258">sept chiffres suivis d’un caractère</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10258">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10259">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10259">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10260">Espace ou trait d’union facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10260">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10261">une lettre à cocher (ne pas sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10261">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10262">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10263">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10263">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10264">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10265">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10265">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10266">La fonction  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ou trouve un contenu qui correspond au `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10266">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10267">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10267">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10268">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10268">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10269">La fonction  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` ou trouve un contenu qui correspond au `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10269">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10293">Numéro de passeport espagnol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10293">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10294">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10294">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10295">combinaison de huit ou neuf caractères de lettres et de chiffres sans espace ni délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10295">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10296">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10296">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10297">combinaison de huit ou neuf caractères de lettres et de chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10297">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10298">deux chiffres ou lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10298">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10299">un chiffre ou une lettre (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10299">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10300">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10300">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10301">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10302">Non applicable</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10302">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10303">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10304">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10305">L’expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10305">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10306">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10306">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10307">L’expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` régulière trouve la date au format JD-MM-AAA OU un mot clé à partir de laquelle est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10307">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10308">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10308">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10309">L’expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10309">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10310">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10310">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
