## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10339">Numéro de sécurité sociale (SSN) espagnol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10339">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10340">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10340">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10341">11 à 12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10341">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10342">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10342">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10343">11 à 12 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10343">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10344">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10344">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10345">barre oblique (facultative)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10345">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10346">sept à huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10346">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10347">barre oblique (facultative)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10347">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10348">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10348">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10349">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10350">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10350">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10351">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10352">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10352">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10353">La fonction Func_spanish_social_security_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10353">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10354">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10354">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="57723-10355">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10355">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10356">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10356">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10357">La fonction Func_spanish_social_security_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10357">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10358">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10358">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10359">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10359">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10360">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10360">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10361">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10361">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10362">ssn #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10362">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10363">socialsecurityno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10363">socialsecurityno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10364">non de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10364">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10365">numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10365">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10366">número de la seguridad social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10366">número de la seguridad social</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10367">Numéro d’identification fiscale espagnol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10367">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-10368">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10368">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10369">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10369">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10370">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10370">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10371">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10371">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10372">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10372">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10373">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10373">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10374">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10375">sept ou huit chiffres et une ou deux lettres dans le modèle spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10375">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10376">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10376">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10377">Personnes physiques espagnoles avec une carte d’identité nationale Espagne :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10377">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10378">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10378">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10379">une lettre en lettres minuscules (sensible à la minuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10379">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-10380">Personnes non résidentes sans carte d’identité nationale Espagne</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10380">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10381">une lettre minuscule « L » (sensible à la minuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10381">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10397">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10397">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10398">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10399">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10400">La fonction  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` ou trouve le contenu qui correspond au `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10400">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10401">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10401">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-10402">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10402">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10403">La fonction  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` ou trouve le contenu qui correspond au `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10403">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10434">SQL Server de connexion</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10434">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10435">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10436">Chaîne « User Id », « User ID », « uid » ou « UserId » suivie des caractères et des chaînes décrits dans le modèle ci-dessous.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10436">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10437">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10437">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10438">la chaîne « User Id », « User ID », « uid » ou « UserId »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10438">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10439">toute combinaison de 1 à 200 lettres minuscules ou majuscules, chiffres, symboles, caractères spéciaux ou espaces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10439">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10440">chaîne « Password » ou « pwd » où « pwd » n’est pas précédé d’une lettre minuscule</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10440">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10441">signe égal (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10441">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10442">tout caractère qui n’est pas un signe dollar ($), un symbole de pourcentage (%) supérieur au symbole (>), au symbole (@), des guillemets (« ), un point-virgule (;), accolade gauche([) ou un crochet gauche ({)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10442">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10443">toute combinaison de 7 à 128 caractères qui ne sont pas des points-virgules (;), barre oblique (/) ou guillemets (« )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10443">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10444">point-virgule (;) ou guillemets (« )</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10444">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10445">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10446">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10446">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10447">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10448">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10448">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10449">L’expression régulière CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10449">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10450">Un mot clé de CEP_GlobalFilter est in trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10450">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10451">L’expression régulière CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder trouve pas de contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10451">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10452">L’expression régulière CEP_CommonExampleKeywords trouve pas de contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10452">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10460">(Notez que techniquement, ce type d’informations sensibles identifie ces mots clés à l’aide d’une expression régulière, et non d’une liste de mots clés.)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10460">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10461">Mot de passe ou pwd suivi de 0 à 2 espaces, d’un signe égal (=), de 0 à 2 espaces et d’un astérisque (\*) -OR-</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10461">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) -OR-</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10462">Mot de passe ou pwd suivi de :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10462">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-10463">Signe Égal (=)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10463">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-10464">Symbole inférieur à (<)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10464">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-10465">Toute combinaison de 1 à 200 caractères contenant des lettres majuscules ou minuscules, des chiffres, un astérisque (\*), un tiret (-), un trait de soulignement (_) ou un espace blanc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10465">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-10466">Symbole supérieur à (>)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10466">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10480">Numéro de permis de conduire suédois</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10480">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10481">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10482">dix chiffres contenant un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10482">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10483">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10484">dix chiffres contenant un trait d’union :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10484">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10485">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10485">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10486">un trait d’union</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10486">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10487">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10487">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10488">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10489">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10489">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10490">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10491">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10492">L’expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` régulière trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10492">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10493">Mot clé à partir  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` de ou `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10493">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

-  <span data-ttu-id="57723-10624">דריווערס דערלויבעניש</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10624">דריווערס דערלויבעניש</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10625">körkortsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10625">körkortsnummer</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10626">ID national suédois</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10626">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10627">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10627">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10628">10 ou 12 chiffres et éventuellement un délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10628">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10629">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10629">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10630">10 ou 12 chiffres et un délimiteur facultatif :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10630">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10631">deux chiffres (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10631">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10632">Six chiffres au format de date AAMMJJ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10632">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10633">délimiteur de « - » ou « + » (facultatif)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10633">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10634">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10634">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10635">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10636">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10636">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10637">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10638">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10638">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10639">La fonction `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10639">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10640">Un mot clé est `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10640">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10641">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10641">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10642">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10642">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10643">La fonction `Func_swedish_national_identifier` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10643">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10644">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10644">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10663">Numéro de passeport suédois</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10663">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10664">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10665">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10665">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10666">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10667">huit chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10667">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10668">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10669">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10669">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10670">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10671">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10671">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10672">l’expression régulière Regex_sweden_passport_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10672">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10673">mot clé à `Keywords_eu_passport_number` partir de ou est `Keyword_sweden_passport` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10673">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10674">l’expression régulière trouve une date au `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` format DD MMM/MMM AA (01 JAN/JAN 12) ou un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10674">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10675">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10676">l’expression régulière Regex_sweden_passport_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10676">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10677">mot clé à `Keywords_eu_passport_number` partir de ou est `Keyword_sweden_passport` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10677">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10713">Numéro d’identification fiscale suédois</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10713">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-10714">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10714">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10715">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10715">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10716">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10716">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10717">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10717">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10718">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10718">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10719">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10719">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10720">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10721">10 chiffres et un symbole dans le modèle spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10721">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10722">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10723">10 chiffres et un symbole :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10723">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10724">six chiffres qui correspondent à la date de naissance (AAMMMMDD)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10724">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10725">signe plus ou signe moins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10725">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10726">trois chiffres qui rendent le numéro d’identification unique où :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10726">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="57723-10727">pour les nombres émis avant 1990, le septième et le huitième chiffres identifient le département de naissance ou les personnes étrangères</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10727">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="57723-10728">le chiffre à la neuvième position indique le sexe par impair pour l’homme ou même pour la femme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10728">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10729">un chiffre de vérification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10729">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10730">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10731">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10731">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10732">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10733">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10733">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10734">La fonction  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10734">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10735">Un mot clé est  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10735">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="57723-10736">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10736">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10737">La fonction  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10737">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10763">Code SWIFT</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10763">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10764">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10765">quatre lettres suivies de 5 à 31 lettres ou chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10765">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10766">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10767">quatre lettres suivies de 5 à 31 lettres ou chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10767">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10768">code bancaire à quatre lettres (ne pas sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10768">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10769">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10769">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10770">4 à 28 lettres ou chiffres (numéro de compte bancaire de base (BBAN))</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10770">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10771">espace facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10771">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10772">une à trois lettres ou chiffres (reste du BBAN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10772">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10773">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10774">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10774">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10775">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10776">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10776">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10777">L’expression régulière Regex_swift trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10777">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10778">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_swift est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10778">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10815">Numéro SSN AHV suisse</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10815">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-10816">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10816">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10817">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10817">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10818">stratégies de conformité des communications</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10818">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10819">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10819">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10820">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10820">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10821">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10821">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10822">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10822">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10823">Nombre à 13 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10823">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10824">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10824">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10825">Nombre à 13 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10825">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10826">trois chiffres - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10826">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10827">un point facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10827">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10828">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10828">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10829">un point facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10829">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10830">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10830">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10831">un point facultatif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10831">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10832">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10832">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10833">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10833">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10834">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10834">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10835">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10835">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10836">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10836">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10837">La fonction Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10837">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10838">Un mot clé de Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10838">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10839">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10839">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10840">La fonction Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10840">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10861">Numéro d’identification national Taïwan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10861">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10862">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10863">une lettre (en anglais) suivie de neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10863">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10864">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10865">une lettre (en anglais) suivie de neuf chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10865">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10866">une lettre (en anglais, ne doit pas être sensible à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10866">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10867">le chiffre « 1 » ou « 2 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10867">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10868">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10868">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10869">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10869">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10870">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10870">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10871">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10871">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10872">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10872">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10873">La fonction Func_taiwanese_national_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10873">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10874">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_taiwanese_national_id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10874">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10875">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10875">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10876">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10876">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10877">La fonction Func_taiwanese_national_id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10877">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10878">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10878">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10895">Numéro de passeport Taïwan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10895">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10896">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10896">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10897">numéro de passeport biométrique : neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10897">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10898">Numéro de passeport non biométrique : neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10898">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10899">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10899">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-10900">numéro de passeport biométrique :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10900">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10901">caractère « 3 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10901">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10902">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10902">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10903">Numéro de passeport non biométrique :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10903">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10904">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10904">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10905">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10906">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10906">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10907">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10908">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10908">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10909">L’expression régulière Regex_taiwan_passport trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10909">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10910">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_taiwan_passport est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10910">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10921">Numéro de certificat taïwanais (ARC/TARC)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10921">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10922">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10923">10 lettres et chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10923">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10924">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10925">10 lettres et chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10925">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10926">deux lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10926">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10927">huit chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10927">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10928">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10928">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10929">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10929">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10930">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10930">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10931">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10931">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10932">L’expression régulière Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10932">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10933">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10933">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10947">Code d’identification de population thaï</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10947">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10948">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10949">13 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10949">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10950">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10951">13 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10951">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10952">le premier chiffre n’est pas zéro ou neuf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10952">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10953">12 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10953">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10954">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10955">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10955">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10956">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10957">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10957">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10958">La fonction Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10958">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10959">Un mot clé de Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10959">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10960">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10960">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10961">La fonction Func_Thai_Citizen_Id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10961">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10970">Numéro d’identification national turc</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10970">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10971">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10972">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10972">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10973">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10974">11 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10974">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10975">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10976">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10976">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10977">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10978">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10978">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10979">La fonction Func_Turkish_National_Id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10979">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10980">Un mot clé de Keyword_Turkish_National_Id est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10980">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10981">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10982">La fonction Func_Turkish_National_Id trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10982">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10984">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10984">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10989">Royaume-Uni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10989">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="57723-10990">numéro de permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10990">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10991">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10991">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10992">Combinaison de 18 lettres et chiffres au format spécifié</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10992">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-10993">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10993">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-10994">18 lettres et chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10994">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10995">Cinq lettres (ne sensibles à la majuscule) ou le chiffre « 9 » à la place d’une lettre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10995">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10996">Un chiffre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10996">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10997">Cinq chiffres au format de date MMDDY pour la date de naissance.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10997">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="57723-10998">Le septième caractère est incrémenté de 50 si le pilote est une femme ; pour examen, 51 à 62 au lieu de 01 à 12.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10998">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-10999">Deux lettres (ne sont pas sensibles à la majuscule) ou le chiffre « 9 » à la place d’une lettre.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-10999">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11000">Cinq chiffres.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11000">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11001">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11002">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11002">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11003">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11004">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11005">La fonction `Func_uk_drivers_license` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11005">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11006">Un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11006">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11007">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11007">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11008">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11008">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11009">La fonction `Func_uk_drivers_license` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11009">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11010">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11010">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11131">Royaume-Uni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11131">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="57723-11132">numéro de liste électorale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11132">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11133">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11133">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11134">deux lettres suivies de 1 à 4 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11134">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11135">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11135">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11136">deux lettres (ne faisant pas l’affaire) suivies de 1 à 4 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11136">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11137">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11138">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11139">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11140">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11140">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11141">L’expression régulière Regex_uk_electoral trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11141">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11142">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_uk_electoral est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11142">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11143">Mots-clés</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11143">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11144">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11144">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11145">nomination au conseil</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11145">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11146">formulaire de nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11146">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11147">registre électoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11147">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11148">liste électorale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11148">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11149">Royaume-Uni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11149">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="57723-11150">numéro de service de santé national</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11150">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11151">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11152">10 à 17 chiffres séparés par des espaces</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11152">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11153">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11154">10 à 17 chiffres :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11154">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11155">3 ou 10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11155">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11156">un espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11156">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11157">trois chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11157">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11158">un espace</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11158">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11159">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11159">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11160">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11161">Oui</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11161">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11162">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11163">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11163">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11164">La fonction Func_uk_nhs_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11164">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11165">L’une des affirmations suivantes est vraie :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11165">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-11166">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_uk_nhs_number est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11166">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-11167">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11167">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="57723-11168">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11168">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11169">La somme de contrôle est correcte.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
