## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11187">Royaume-Uni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11187">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="57723-11188">numéro d’assurance national (NINO)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11188">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-11189">Cette entité de type d’informations sensibles est incluse dans le type d’informations sensibles Numéro d’identification national de l’UE.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11189">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="57723-11190">Il est disponible en tant qu’entité de type d’informations sensibles autonome.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11190">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11191">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11192">sept caractères ou neuf caractères séparés par des espaces ou des tirets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11192">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11193">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11194">deux modèles possibles :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11194">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11195">deux lettres (les NINOs valides utilisent uniquement certains caractères dans ce préfixe, que ce modèle valide ; ne sont pas sensibles à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11195">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11196">six chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11196">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11197">« A » (A), « B », « C » ou « D » (comme le préfixe, seuls certains caractères sont autorisés dans le suffixe ; ne sont pas sensibles à la cas)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11197">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11198">OU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11198">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11199">deux lettres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11199">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11200">un espace ou un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11200">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11201">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11201">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11202">un espace ou un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11202">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11203">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11203">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11204">un espace ou un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11204">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11205">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11205">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11206">un espace ou un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11206">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11207">« A » (A), « B » (B), « C » (C) ou « D »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11207">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11208">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11208">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11209">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11209">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11211">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11211">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11212">La fonction Func_uk_nino trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11212">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11214">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11214">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11215">La fonction Func_uk_nino trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11215">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11237">Royaume-Uni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11237">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="57723-11238">Numéro de référence du contribuable unique</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11238">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="57723-11239">Ce type d’informations sensibles est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation dans :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11239">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11240">stratégies de protection contre la perte de données</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11240">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11242">gouvernance des informations</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11242">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11243">gestion des enregistrements</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11243">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11244">Sécurité des applications cloud Microsoft</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11244">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11245">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11246">10 chiffres sans espaces et délimiteur</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11246">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11247">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11248">10 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11248">10 digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11250">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11250">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11252">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11252">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11253">La fonction  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11253">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11274">Numéro de compte bancaire américain</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11274">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11275">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11276">6 à 17 chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11276">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11277">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11278">6 à 17 chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11278">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11279">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11280">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11280">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11281">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11282">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11282">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11283">L’expression régulière Regex_usa_bank_account_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11283">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml

    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11314">Numéro de permis de conduire américain</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11314">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11315">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11315">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11316">Dépend de l’État</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11316">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11317">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11317">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11318">dépend de l’état ( par exemple, New York :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11318">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11319">neuf chiffres formatés comme ddd ddd ddd correspondront.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11319">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11323">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11323">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11324">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11324">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11325">La fonction Func_new_york_drivers_license_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11325">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11326">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11326">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11327">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_us_drivers_license est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11327">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11328">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11328">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11329">La fonction Func_new_york_drivers_license_number trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11329">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11330">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11330">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11331">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11331">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11332">Aucun mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_us_drivers_license n’est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11332">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11430">Numéro d’identification du contribuable individuel américain (ITIN)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11430">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11431">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11432">neuf chiffres qui commencent par un « 9 » et contiennent un « 7 » ou « 8 » comme quatrième chiffre, éventuellement formaté avec des espaces ou des tirets</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11432">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11433">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11434">formaté :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11434">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11435">le chiffre « 9 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11435">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11436">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11436">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11437">un espace ou un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11437">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11438">un « 7 » ou « 8 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11438">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11439">un chiffre</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11439">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11440">un espace ou un tiret</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11440">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11441">quatre chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11441">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11442">non formaté :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11442">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11443">le chiffre « 9 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11443">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11444">deux chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11444">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11445">un « 7 » ou « 8 »</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11445">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11446">cinq chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11446">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11447">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11448">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11448">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11449">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11450">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11450">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11451">La fonction Func_formatted_itin trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11451">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11452">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_itin est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11452">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11453">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11453">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11454">La fonction Func_unformatted_itin trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11454">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11455">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_itin est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11455">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11456">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11456">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11457">La fonction Func_formatted_itin ou Func_unformatted_itin trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11457">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11472">Numéro de sécurité sociale (SSN) des États-Unis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11472">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11473">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11474">neuf chiffres, qui peuvent être dans un modèle formaté ou sans mise en forme</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11474">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="57723-11475">La mise en forme d’un numéro de sécurité sociale émis avant le milieu de l’année 2011 est fixe et certaines parties du numéro doivent se situer dans certaines plages pour qu’il soit valide (mais il n’y a pas de somme de contrôle).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11475">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11476">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11476">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11477">quatre fonctions recherchent des SSN dans quatre modèles différents :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11477">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11478">Func_ssn recherche des numéros de sécurité sociale avec une mise en forme fixe d’avant l’année 2011, mis en forme avec des tirets ou des espaces (ddd-dd-dddd OU ddd dd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11478">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn recherche des numéros de sécurité sociale avec une mise en forme fixe d’avant l’année 2011, avec neuf chiffres consécutifs non mis en forme (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn recherche des numéros de sécurité sociale d’après l’année 2011, mis en forme avec des tirets ou des espaces  (ddd-dd-dddd OU ddd dd dddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn recherche des numéros de sécurité sociale d’après l’année 2011, avec neuf chiffres consécutifs non mis en forme (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11482">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11483">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11483">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11484">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11484">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11485">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11485">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11486">La fonction Func_ssn trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11486">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11487">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ssn est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11487">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11488">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11488">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11489">La fonction Func_unformatted_ssn trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11489">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11490">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ssn est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11490">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11491">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11491">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11492">La fonction Func_randomized_formatted_ssn trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11492">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11493">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ssn est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11493">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11494">Une stratégie DLP a peu de confiance qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11494">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11495">La fonction Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11495">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11496">Un mot clé figurant dans la liste Keyword_ssn est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11496">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11514">neuf chiffres</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11514">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11515">Motif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11516">neuf chiffres consécutifs</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11516">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11517">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11518">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11518">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11519">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11520">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance élevée dans la détection de ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11521">La fonction Func_usa_uk_passport trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11521">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11522">Mot clé à partir `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11522">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11523">Un mot clé est `Keywords_eu_passport_date` trouvé</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11523">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11524">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11525">La fonction Func_usa_uk_passport trouve un contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11525">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11526">Mot clé à partir `Keywords_eu_passport_number` de ou `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11526">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11553">Somme de contrôle</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11553">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11554">Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11554">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="57723-11555">Définition</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11555">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="57723-11556">Une stratégie DLP a une confiance moyenne qu’elle a détecté ce type d’informations sensibles si, dans une proximité de 300 caractères :</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11556">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11557">L’Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic recherche le contenu qui correspond au modèle.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11557">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="57723-11558">Un mot clé de Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic est trouvé.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="57723-11558">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
